With every out-breath, you let go a little more. With every in-breath, you invite calm and stillness. (Pause 5s)

Bring your awareness to your feet. Notice the weight of your feet resting on the floor or the surface beneath you. Feel your toes relaxing... each toe letting go of any tension.

Feel the soles of your feet becoming soft and heavy. Feel your heels sinking... your ankles releasing. (Pause 3s) Let this wave of relaxation move slowly up through your calves, your shins, and your knees.

Your legs feel heavy and relaxed, as if they are gently melting into the support beneath you. (Pause 5s)

Feel your thighs relaxing, becoming soft and loose. This soothing sensation continues into your hips and your lower back, releasing any stiffness or holding. Your abdomen softens... your stomach muscles letting go completely.

Your chest relaxes with each gentle breath. (Pause 3s) Feel the relaxation spreading up your spine, vertebra by vertebra... through your shoulders, and down your arms to your elbows, your forearms, your wrists, and your fingertips. Your arms are loose and heavy. (Pause 5s)

Your neck relaxes... your jaw unclenches... your tongue rests gently in your mouth... your facial muscles soften... your forehead is smooth and calm. Your eyelids feel wonderfully heavy. (Pause 3s) You are now deeply relaxed, peaceful, and calm.

Your whole body feels supported. Your mind is becoming still. (Pause 5s) Every time you breathe out, you go a little deeper.

Deeper and deeper into this safe, comfortable state of relaxation. Nothing can disturb you here. You are safe.

You are at ease. (Pause 5s)"

## Deepener - The Connection Bridge

"Imagine yourself standing at the edge of a beautiful, sturdy bridge. (Pause 3s) The bridge stretches before you, connecting you to the other sidewhere your ideal client waits. (Pause 3s) You are not pushing.

You are not selling. You are simply building connection. (Pause 5s) You take a step onto the bridge.

It holds you. It is built on trust and understanding. With each step, you feel more confident. (Pause 5s)

You see the person on the other side. You listen. You seek to understand their needs.

The bridge grows stronger with every genuine exchange. (Pause 3s) You are not crossing to take something. You are crossing to offer value.

To serve. To find the win-win. (Pause 5s) The connection between you and your client is real.

It is built on respect. Let this feeling of authentic connection draw you deeper. The Connection Bridge is within you.

You can walk it whenever you choose."

## Therapeutic Content

"Now, in this calm state, feel a deep sense of confidence in your ability to connect and serve. (Pause 3s) You recognise that sales, at its best, is not manipulation. It is service.

It is listening. It is understanding what someone needs and offering a genuine solution. (Pause 5s) Any old patterns of fear of rejection, pushiness, or doubt simply dissolve.

In their place, a calm sense of purpose and connection grows. (Pause 5s) Imagine yourself in a sales conversation. You are not anxious.

You are curious. You ask questions. You listen to the answers. (Pause 3s)

You understand the other person. You see how your product or service can genuinely help them. You speak with clarity and warmth. (Pause 5s)

You know that rejection is not personal. It is simply a no to this offer at this time. You remain confident.

You remain respectful. You seek win-win outcomes. (Pause 5s) From this moment forward, you will find it easier to approach sales as service.

You will instinctively listen before you speak. You will build rapport through genuine interest. (Pause 3s) You will overcome the fear of rejection because you know that every no brings you closer to a yes that fits.

You will use ethical persuasionhelping people see value, not pressuring them. (Pause 5s) When you feel the old urge to push or the old fear of rejection, you can picture the bridge. You can breathe.

You can ask yourself: how can I serve this person? (Pause 5s) You are becoming a person who sells with integrity. A person who connects.

A person who creates wins for everyone. (Pause 3s) See yourself tomorrow... in a sales situation. You are calm.

You listen. You respond with understanding. You offer value. (Pause 5s)

See yourself next week... facing a difficult objection. Instead of fear, you feel curiosity. You ask another question.

You find common ground. (Pause 5s) See yourself in the months to come... your confidence growing with every conversation. You know that connection is the foundation.

You build it naturally. (Pause 3s) Your subconscious has received these suggestions. It will remind you of the Connection Bridge.

It will help you choose listening when the old habit of pushing tries to return. (Pause 5s) Ethical persuasion is not about tricking anyone. It is about presenting value clearly.

It is about understanding. It is about creating outcomes where both sides benefit. (Pause 5s) So let this feeling of confidence sink in.

You have the ability to connect. You can listen. You can serve.

You can persuade with integrity. (Pause 3s) The bridge and the connection are within you. Whenever you need to remember, you can close your eyes and see the sturdy bridge. (Pause 5s)

You deserve to feel confident in sales. You deserve to move through conversations without fear of rejection. (Pause 3s) From this day forward, connection is your default.

You are building a practice of service-based sales. One conversation at a time. (Pause 5s) Trust that when you listen, you understand.

When you understand, you can help. When you help, you create win-win. (Pause 5s) In every sales conversation, you will lead with curiosity.

You will ask what the other person needs. You will listen more than you talk. (Pause 5s) When you face rejection, you will not take it personally.

You will learn. You will move forward. You will stay confident. (Pause 3s)

When you present your offer, you will do so with clarity and belief. You will focus on value. You will invite rather than pressure. (Pause 5s)

Your subconscious is now aligned with sales as service. It will remind you of the bridge. It will remind you to connect.

It will help you choose understanding over fear. (Pause 3s) Let that truth settle in. You are a person who sells with confidence and integrity.

You connect. You serve. You create win-win.

You have this resource now. Use it well. (Pause 3s) The Connection Bridge is yours.

It will never collapse when you build it on genuine understanding. It will always remind you: connection first. Service always. (Pause 3s)

When you feel nervous before a call, you can breathe and remember the bridge. When someone says no, you can thank them and move on. When you present, you can focus on their needs, not your fear. (Pause 5s)

Sales confidence is a gift you give yourself. It reduces anxiety. It increases results.

It makes you someone people trust. (Pause 5s) You may have believed that sales required aggression. Now you know that sales at its best requires connection. (Pause 3s)

Every time you choose to listen and serve, you strengthen this new habit. Your subconscious is learning: I can connect. I can handle rejection. (Pause 5s)

The world will still have people who say no. But you no longer have to fear it. You can accept it and move on. (Pause 3s)

Some conversations will still be challenging. Some objections will still arise. Your job is not to win every time.

Your job is to show up with confidence and integrity every time. (Pause 5s) Each time you succeed, you prove to yourself that connection works. That service sells.

That you can do this. (Pause 5s) So hold on to this feeling as we prepare to bring you back. You have connected with the Connection Bridge.

You have connected with confidence and service. (Pause 5s) Your mind and body will remember. When fear knocks, you can answer with a breath.

With the image of the bridge. With the knowledge that you connect through service. (Pause 3s) You deserve to feel this confidence.

You deserve to move through sales conversations without dread. The Connection Bridge is yours. Use it.

Trust it. You sell with integrity now. (Pause 3s) Whenever you listen to this script again, the connection to the bridge will deepen.

Your capacity for confident, ethical persuasion will grow. (Pause 5s) You are not becoming someone else. You are allowing a part of yourself that has always had the capacity for connection to take the lead. (Pause 3s)

Many people fear rejection. You are learning that rejection is simply redirection. You are building bridges.

You are serving. (Pause 5s) The bridge is yours. The connection is yours.

The feeling of confident service is yours. (Pause 3s) So as you go back into your day, carry the Connection Bridge with you. When you feel the first flicker of fear, pause.

Breathe. Remember the bridge. (Pause 5s) You have everything you need to sell with confidence.

You have this experience. You have the image of the sturdy bridge. You have the choice, from now on, to connect and serve. (Pause 3s)

Let that truth guide you. You are confident. You connect.

You serve. Rejection cannot take that from you. (Pause 3s) Your subconscious has received these suggestions.

It will support your sales confidence in the days and weeks to come. (Pause 5s) When you are facing a difficult client or a big pitch, you can return to this feeling. You can remember that listening builds trust.

That service creates results. (Pause 5s) You deserve to move through your sales life without the constant weight of fear. You deserve the confidence that connection brings. (Pause 3s)

The Connection Bridge has awakened something in you. That awakening is permanent. You are a person who sells with confidence and integrity.

Believe it. Live it. (Pause 5s) And whenever doubt tries to return, you can smile inwardly.

You know another way. You know the way of the bridge. You choose connection.

Again and again. You choose service. (Pause 3s) So take this gift with you.

The gift of confidence. The gift of the Connection Bridge. (Pause 5s) Your mind and body have learned something today.

They will remember. When you need to connect, you will know how. When you need to serve, you will do it. (Pause 3s)

You are building a practice of ethical sales. One conversation at a time. The bridge is within you.

Connection is always possible. You have confidence. You are the bridge-builder.

You are free from the fear of rejection. (Pause 3s) From this day forward, let the Connection Bridge guide you. When you feel nervous, picture the bridge.

When you face rejection, take a breath and remember it is not personal. (Pause 5s) You have trained your mind for sales confidence. That training will stay with you. (Pause 3s)

Honour this change. Use it. You deserve to sell without fear.

The Connection Bridge is yours for life. (Pause 3s) And as we bring you back to full awareness, hold on to that feeling. You are confident.

You can connect. You can serve. (Pause 5s) Your subconscious will remind you.

Whenever fear rises, you can return to the bridge. To the connection. To the peace of service-based sales. (Pause 3s)

You are a person who sells with confidence. You have proven it to yourself today. Trust that.

Live that. You have connection. You choose service. (Pause 3s)

The bridge is part of you now. It will be there whenever you close your eyes and seek confidence. (Pause 5s) You have taken an important step.

You have connected with sales as service. Let it guide you. Let it ease your conversations.

You deserve this confidence. You have earned it. The Connection Bridge is always with you. (Pause 3s)

So go forward into your day with this confidence. With this connection. With the knowledge that you can persuade with integrity. (Pause 5s)

Your mind has received this training. It will support you. You are ready.

You sell with confidence. Believe it. (Pause 3s) You have the Connection Bridge.

You have the ability to connect. Use them well. You are at ease with sales.

You serve. Always. (Pause 3s) Your subconscious holds the image of the bridge.

It will remind you to listen and connect. You are a person who sells with integrity. Trust yourself.

You have this now. The bridge is yours. Confidence is your choice.

From this day forward. You are ready. You are the connection.

Go in peace. Sales is service. Rejection is redirection.

Every conversation is a chance to connect and to offer value. (Pause 3s) The bridge is sturdy. You walk it with confidence.

You listen. You serve. You create win-win outcomes. (Pause 5s)

Your ideal clients are waiting on the other side. You have the ability to reach them. One genuine connection at a time. (Pause 3s)

You deserve to sell with confidence and integrity every day."

## Termination

"Now, it is time to gently return to your full waking awareness, bringing with you all the positive feelings of confidence, connection, and ethical persuasion. (Pause 3s) I will count from one to five, and with each number, you will feel more and more alert, refreshed, and ready to engage with your day.

One... beginning to feel a gentle energy returning to your body. You are safe and grounded. Two... becoming more aware of your surroundings, feeling grounded and present in the room.

Three... feeling refreshed and invigorated, carrying your newfound sales confidence and connection with you into your day. Four... your mind is clear, your body is energised, and you are ready to open your eyes. And five... eyes open, wide awake, feeling absolutely wonderful, confident, and ready to embrace your sales conversations with integrity and connection. (Pause 3s)

Remember: the Connection Bridge is within you. You can connect and serve with confidence."

scripts.title: Motivation for Exercise
scripts.introduction: This script is designed to help individuals cultivate a strong and consistent motivation for regular exercise, fostering a love for movement and a commitment to physical well-being. It aims to reprogram any resistance to exercise into enthusiastic engagement.
scripts.content:
## Induction - Progressive Relaxation

"As you settle into a comfortable position, allow your eyes to gently close. (Pause 3s) Take a deep, calming breath in through your nose... and as you exhale slowly through your mouth, release any tension you might be holding in your shoulders or your jaw. (Pause 3s) Continue to breathe deeply and evenly, allowing each breath to carry you deeper into relaxation.

With every out-breath, you let go a little more. With every in-breath, you invite calm and stillness. (Pause 5s)

Bring your awareness to your feet. Notice the weight of your feet resting on the floor or the surface beneath you. Feel your toes relaxing... each toe letting go of any tension.

Your whole body feels supported. Your mind is becoming still. (Pause 5s) Every time you breathe out, you go a little deeper.

Deeper and deeper into this safe, comfortable state of relaxation. Nothing can disturb you here. You are safe.

You are at ease. (Pause 5s)"

## Deepener - The Energy Flow

"Imagine a soft, vibrant light at the centre of your body. (Pause 3s) It is warm and alive. It is vitality itself. (Pause 3s)

With each breath, this light grows brighter. It spreads through your chest, your arms, your legs. (Pause 5s) Your body is awakening to the possibility of movement.

Not as a chore. As a celebration. (Pause 5s) You feel the energy flowing.

Your muscles remember what it is to be used. To be strong. To be alive. (Pause 3s)

The light pulses gently. You are connected to your physical self. You are ready to move. (Pause 5s)

This is the Energy Flow. It is always there. It waits for you to choose activity.

To choose life. (Pause 5s) Let this feeling of vibrant vitality draw you deeper. The Energy Flow is within you.

You can return to it whenever you need motivation to move."

## Therapeutic Content

"Now, in this calm state, feel a deep sense of enthusiasm for movement awakening within you. (Pause 3s) You recognise that exercise is not a punishment. It is a celebration of what your body can do.

It is a gift you give yourself. (Pause 5s) Any old patterns of seeing exercise as a chore, avoiding it, or feeling too tired simply dissolve. In their place, a genuine desire for movement and physical wellbeing grows. (Pause 5s)

Imagine yourself choosing to move. Perhaps a walk. Perhaps a run.

Perhaps a class or the gym. (Pause 3s) You feel enthusiasm. You feel your body responding.

You enjoy the sensation of your heart pumping, your muscles working. (Pause 5s) You understand that consistency matters more than intensity. Small, regular movement builds a habit.

It creates joy. It improves every part of your life. (Pause 5s) From this moment forward, you will find it easier to get moving.

You will instinctively look forward to exercise. You will feel the Energy Flow and want to honour it. (Pause 3s) You will maintain consistency because you have connected exercise with joy, not duty.

You will prioritise your physical wellbeing. (Pause 5s) When you feel the old resistance or the thought that you are too tired, you can picture the vibrant light. You can breathe.

You can ask yourself: what would my body love to do right now? (Pause 5s) You are becoming a person who moves with joy. A person who celebrates their body.

A person who enjoys physical activity. (Pause 3s) See yourself tomorrow... lacing up your shoes or stepping onto the mat. You feel eager.

You begin. You enjoy the movement. (Pause 5s) See yourself next week... having moved several times.

You feel stronger. You feel more energised. You look forward to the next session. (Pause 5s)

See yourself in the months to come... exercise is part of your life. It is not a struggle. It is a pleasure.

Your physical wellbeing has improved. (Pause 3s) Your subconscious has received these suggestions. It will remind you of the Energy Flow.

It will help you choose movement when the old habit of staying still tries to return. (Pause 5s) Exercise as celebration changes everything. It reduces stress.

It boosts mood. It gives you more energy for the rest of your life. (Pause 5s) So let this feeling of enthusiasm sink in.

You have a body that wants to move. You can choose activity. You can enjoy it. (Pause 3s)

The vibrant light and the Energy Flow are within you. Whenever you need to remember, you can close your eyes and feel the vitality. (Pause 5s) You deserve to feel the joy of movement.

You deserve to experience physical wellbeing. (Pause 3s) From this day forward, movement is your friend. You are building a life of consistency and joy in exercise.

One session at a time. (Pause 5s) Trust that when you move, you feel better. When you are consistent, you build strength and habit.

When you enjoy it, you sustain it. (Pause 5s) In your daily life, you will find yourself wanting to move. You will schedule it.

You will protect it. You will feel good when you do it. (Pause 5s) When you feel tired, you will remember that movement often creates energy.

You will start small. You will build from there. (Pause 3s) When you miss a session, you will not punish yourself.

You will simply begin again. Consistency over perfection. (Pause 5s) Your subconscious is now aligned with exercise as celebration.

It will remind you of the Energy Flow. It will remind you to move. It will help you choose enthusiasm over resistance. (Pause 3s)

Let that truth settle in. You are a person who enjoys movement. You are consistent.

You celebrate your body. You have this resource now. Use it well. (Pause 3s)

The Energy Flow is yours. It will never judge you. It will always welcome you when you choose to move. (Pause 3s)

When you do not feel like exercising, you can remember the vibrant light. When you have had a long day, you can choose a gentle movement. When you have more energy, you can push a little more. (Pause 5s)

Physical wellbeing is a gift you give yourself. It improves sleep. It sharpens mind.

It makes you feel alive. (Pause 5s) You may have believed that exercise was something you had to force. Now you know it can be something you look forward to. (Pause 3s)

Every time you choose to move, you strengthen this new habit. Your subconscious is learning: I enjoy movement. I can be consistent. (Pause 5s)

The body will still have days when it feels heavy. But you no longer have to wait for perfect conditions. You can start. (Pause 3s)

Some sessions will still be challenging. Some days you will prefer rest. Your job is not to be perfect.

Your job is to move regularly and enjoy it. (Pause 5s) Each time you succeed, you prove to yourself that you can do this. That movement feels good.

That consistency works. (Pause 5s) So hold on to this feeling as we prepare to bring you back. You have connected with the Energy Flow.

You have connected with the joy of movement. (Pause 5s) Your mind and body will remember. When resistance knocks, you can answer with a breath.

With the image of the vibrant light. With the knowledge that your body wants to move. (Pause 3s) You deserve to feel this enthusiasm.

You deserve to experience the joy of physical activity. The Energy Flow is yours. Use it.

Trust it. You are someone who moves with joy now. (Pause 3s) Whenever you listen to this script again, the connection to the Energy Flow will deepen.

Your motivation for exercise will grow. (Pause 5s) You are not becoming someone else. You are allowing a part of yourself that has always had the capacity for vitality to take the lead. (Pause 3s)

Many people see exercise as a duty. You are learning to see it as a celebration. You are reconnecting with the joy of movement. (Pause 5s)

The vibrant light is yours. The Energy Flow is yours. The feeling of physical wellbeing is yours. (Pause 3s)

So as you go back into your day, carry the Energy Flow with you. When you feel the first flicker of resistance, pause. Breathe.

Remember the light. (Pause 5s) You have everything you need to move with consistency and joy. You have this experience.

You have the image of the vibrant light. You have the choice, from now on, to celebrate your body through movement. (Pause 3s) Let that truth guide you.

You are enthusiastic. You are consistent. You enjoy exercise.

Your body thanks you. (Pause 3s) Your subconscious has received these suggestions. It will support your motivation for exercise in the days and weeks to come. (Pause 5s)

When you are tempted to skip a session, you can return to this feeling. You can remember that movement brings energy. That consistency brings results. (Pause 5s)

You deserve to move through life with vitality. You deserve the physical wellbeing that exercise brings. (Pause 3s) The Energy Flow has awakened something in you.

That awakening is permanent. You are a person who enjoys exercise. Believe it.

Live it. (Pause 5s) And whenever the old voice says you are too tired, you can smile inwardly. You know another way.

You know the Energy Flow. You choose movement. Again and again.

You choose vitality. (Pause 3s) So take this gift with you. The gift of enthusiasm.

The gift of the Energy Flow. (Pause 5s) Your mind and body have learned something today. They will remember.

When you need to move, you will feel the pull. When you need to start, you will do it. (Pause 3s) You are building a life of physical wellbeing.

One movement at a time. The Energy Flow is within you. The vibrant light is always there.

You have enthusiasm. You are someone who moves. You are alive in your body. (Pause 3s)

From this day forward, let the Energy Flow guide you. When you feel sluggish, picture the light. When you feel resistant, take a breath and take one step. (Pause 5s)

You have trained your mind for exercise motivation. That training will stay with you. (Pause 3s) Honour this change.

Use it. You deserve to enjoy movement. The Energy Flow is yours for life. (Pause 3s)

And as we bring you back to full awareness, hold on to that feeling. You are enthusiastic. You can move.

You can enjoy exercise. (Pause 5s) Your subconscious will remind you. Whenever resistance rises, you can return to the vibrant light.

To the Energy Flow. To the joy of movement. (Pause 3s) You are a person who exercises with joy.

You have proven it to yourself today. Trust that. Live that.

You have vitality. You choose movement. (Pause 3s) The Energy Flow is part of you now.

It will be there whenever you close your eyes and seek motivation. (Pause 5s) You have taken an important step. You have connected with exercise as celebration.

Let it guide you. Let it energise your days. You deserve this physical wellbeing.

You have earned it. The Energy Flow is always with you. (Pause 3s) So go forward into your day with this enthusiasm.

With this vitality. With the knowledge that you can move with joy. (Pause 5s) Your mind has received this training.

It will support you. You are ready. You enjoy exercise.

Believe it. (Pause 3s) You have the Energy Flow. You have the vibrant light.

Use them well. You are at ease with movement. You celebrate your body.

Always. (Pause 3s) Your subconscious holds the image of the vibrant light. It will remind you to move and to enjoy it.

You are a person who values physical wellbeing. Trust yourself. You have this now.

The Energy Flow is yours. Enthusiasm is your choice. From this day forward.

You are ready. You are the Energy Flow. Go in peace.

Movement is celebration. Your body is designed to move. Every step, every stretch, every session honours that design. (Pause 3s)

The vibrant light never fades. It is always there, inviting you to move. You have the enthusiasm.

You have the consistency. (Pause 5s) Physical wellbeing is not a luxury. It is a foundation.

You are building that foundation every time you choose to move. (Pause 3s) Joy in movement is your birthright. Claim it.

The Energy Flow is with you always."

## Termination

"Now, it is time to gently return to your full waking awareness, bringing with you all the positive feelings of enthusiasm, vitality, and joy in movement. (Pause 3s) I will count from one to five, and with each number, you will feel more and more alert, refreshed, and ready to engage with your day.

One... beginning to feel a gentle energy returning to your body. You are safe and grounded. Two... becoming more aware of your surroundings, feeling grounded and present in the room.

Three... feeling refreshed and invigorated, carrying your newfound motivation for exercise and vitality with you into your day. Four... your mind is clear, your body is energised, and you are ready to open your eyes. And five... eyes open, wide awake, feeling absolutely wonderful, energised, and ready to embrace your day with the joy of movement. (Pause 3s)

Remember: the Energy Flow is within you. You can move with enthusiasm and joy."

scripts.title: Breaking Bad Habits
scripts.introduction: This script is designed to help individuals identify and break unwanted habits, replacing them with positive, empowering behaviours. It aims to reprogram the subconscious mind to release old patterns and embrace new, healthier choices.

The light in your chest grows brighter. (Pause 3s) You are not fighting the habit. You are simply releasing it.

Making space for something new. (Pause 5s) The valve stays open. The old energy flows out.

scripts.title: Building New Habits
scripts.introduction: This script is designed to help individuals successfully establish and integrate new, positive habits into their daily lives. It aims to reprogram the subconscious mind to embrace and sustain beneficial routines.
scripts.content:
## Induction - Progressive Relaxation

"As you settle into a comfortable position, allow your eyes to gently close. (Pause 3s) Take a deep, calming breath in through your nose... and as you exhale slowly through your mouth, release any tension you might be holding in your shoulders or your jaw. (Pause 3s) Continue to breathe deeply and evenly, allowing each breath to carry you deeper into relaxation.

With every out-breath, you let go a little more. With every in-breath, you invite calm and stillness. (Pause 5s)

Bring your awareness to your feet. Notice the weight of your feet resting on the floor or the surface beneath you. Feel your toes relaxing... each toe letting go of any tension.

Feel the soles of your feet becoming soft and heavy. Feel your heels sinking... your ankles releasing. (Pause 3s) Let this wave of relaxation move slowly up through your calves, your shins, and your knees.

Your legs feel heavy and relaxed, as if they are gently melting into the support beneath you. (Pause 5s)

Feel your thighs relaxing, becoming soft and loose. This soothing sensation continues into your hips and your lower back, releasing any stiffness or holding. Your abdomen softens... your stomach muscles letting go completely.

Your chest relaxes with each gentle breath. (Pause 3s) Feel the relaxation spreading up your spine, vertebra by vertebra... through your shoulders, and down your arms to your elbows, your forearms, your wrists, and your fingertips. Your arms are loose and heavy. (Pause 5s)

Your neck relaxes... your jaw unclenches... your tongue rests gently in your mouth... your facial muscles soften... your forehead is smooth and calm. Your eyelids feel wonderfully heavy. (Pause 3s) You are now deeply relaxed, peaceful, and calm.

Your whole body feels supported. Your mind is becoming still. (Pause 5s) Every time you breathe out, you go a little deeper.

Deeper and deeper into this safe, comfortable state of relaxation. Nothing can disturb you here. You are safe.

You are at ease. (Pause 5s)"

## Deepener - The Blueprint of Change

"Imagine yourself in a quiet, well-lit workshop. (Pause 3s) On the table before you lies a blueprinta plan for the new habit you wish to build. (Pause 3s) The blueprint shows clear steps.

Small. Achievable. Each step leads to the next. (Pause 5s)

You study the first step. It is simple. You could do it today.

You feel a sense of possibility. (Pause 5s) You see yourself following the blueprint. Step one.

Then step two. No rush. Just steady progress. (Pause 3s)

The workshop is yours. The blueprint is yours. You have everything you need to build this new habit. (Pause 5s)

With each small step, momentum grows. The blueprint becomes reality. You are the builder. (Pause 5s)

Let this feeling of clear direction draw you deeper. The Blueprint of Change is within you. You can return to this workshop whenever you need to build something new."

## Therapeutic Content

"Now, in this calm state, feel a deep sense of possibility for building new habits. (Pause 3s) You recognise that lasting change does not happen in one leap. It happens through small, consistent steps.

It requires patience. It builds momentum. (Pause 5s) Any old belief that you cannot change or that you lack discipline simply dissolves.

In its place, a calm sense of capability and direction grows. (Pause 5s) Imagine yourself following your new habit. Perhaps it is a morning routine.

Perhaps it is a skill. Perhaps it is a healthy behaviour. (Pause 3s) You take the first step.

It is small. You complete it. You feel good.

You take the next step. (Pause 5s) You understand that integrating new routines takes time. You are patient with yourself.

You celebrate small wins. You keep going. (Pause 5s) From this moment forward, you will find it easier to take the first step.

You will instinctively break your goal into small, doable actions. You will build momentum through consistency. (Pause 3s) You will integrate new routines into your life because you have connected habit-building with patience and self-improvement.

You will trust the process. (Pause 5s) When you feel the old doubt or the thought that it is too hard, you can picture the blueprint. You can breathe.

You can ask yourself: what is the one small step I can take right now? (Pause 5s) You are becoming a person who builds new habits with ease. A person who takes small steps.

A person who improves steadily. (Pause 3s) See yourself tomorrow... taking the first step from your blueprint. It is simple.

You do it. You feel a sense of progress. (Pause 5s) See yourself next week... you have taken several steps.

The new habit is taking shape. You feel momentum. You feel proud. (Pause 5s)

See yourself in the months to come... the new habit is part of your life. It feels natural. It is integrated.

You have changed. (Pause 3s) Your subconscious has received these suggestions. It will remind you of the Blueprint of Change.

It will help you take the next small step when resistance appears. (Pause 5s) Building new habits is not about perfection. It is about progress.

It is about small, consistent steps. It is about patience and momentum. (Pause 5s) So let this feeling of capability sink in.

You have the ability to build new habits. You can take small steps. You can be patient. (Pause 3s)

The blueprint and the workshop are within you. Whenever you need to remember, you can close your eyes and see the clear steps. (Pause 5s) You deserve to become the person you wish to be.

You deserve to build habits that serve you. (Pause 3s) From this day forward, small steps are your default. You are building a life of self-improvement.

One step at a time. (Pause 5s) Trust that when you take one step, you build momentum. When you are consistent, you integrate.

When you are patient, you succeed. (Pause 5s) In your daily life, you will find yourself following your blueprint. You will take the next step.

You will not wait for perfect conditions. (Pause 5s) When you miss a day, you will not give up. You will return to the blueprint.

You will take the next step. (Pause 3s) When you feel impatient, you will remember that habits are built slowly. You will honour the process.

You will keep going. (Pause 5s) Your subconscious is now aligned with building new habits. It will remind you of the blueprint.

It will remind you to take the next step. It will help you choose consistency over perfection. (Pause 3s) Let that truth settle in.

You are a person who can build new habits. You take small steps. You have patience.

You have this resource now. Use it well. (Pause 3s) The Blueprint of Change is yours.

It will never judge you for going slowly. It will always show you the next step. (Pause 3s) When you feel stuck, you can look at the blueprint.

When you feel overwhelmed, you can focus on one step. When you succeed, you can acknowledge it and continue. (Pause 5s) Self-improvement is a gift you give yourself.

It builds confidence. It creates lasting change. It proves you can grow. (Pause 5s)

You may have believed that building habits was too hard. Now you know that small steps make it possible. (Pause 3s) Every time you take the next step, you strengthen the new habit.

Your subconscious is learning: I can build habits. I can be consistent. (Pause 5s) The journey will still have ups and downs.

But you no longer have to wait for motivation. You can take one step. (Pause 3s) Some days will still be challenging.

Some steps will still feel difficult. Your job is not to be perfect. Your job is to take the next step and keep going. (Pause 5s)

Each time you succeed, you prove to yourself that you can build this habit. That momentum works. That you are capable. (Pause 5s)

So hold on to this feeling as we prepare to bring you back. You have connected with the Blueprint of Change. You have connected with possibility. (Pause 5s)

Your mind and body will remember. When doubt knocks, you can answer with a breath. With the image of the blueprint.

With the knowledge that you can take the next step. (Pause 3s) You deserve to feel this capability. You deserve to build habits that improve your life.

The Blueprint of Change is yours. Use it. Trust it.

You are someone who builds new habits now. (Pause 3s) Whenever you listen to this script again, the connection to the blueprint will deepen. Your ability to build new habits will grow. (Pause 5s)

You are not becoming someone else. You are allowing a part of yourself that has always had the capacity for growth to take the lead. (Pause 3s) Many people want to change but do not know where to start.

You have the blueprint. You have the steps. You have the workshop. (Pause 5s)

The blueprint is yours. The workshop is yours. The feeling of steady progress is yours. (Pause 3s)

So as you go back into your day, carry the Blueprint of Change with you. When you feel the first flicker of doubt, pause. Breathe.

Remember the blueprint. (Pause 5s) You have everything you need to build this new habit. You have this experience.

You have the image of the clear steps. You have the choice, from now on, to take small, consistent steps. (Pause 3s) Let that truth guide you.

You are capable. You can take the next step. You can be patient.

You are building. (Pause 3s) Your subconscious has received these suggestions. It will support your habit-building in the days and weeks to come. (Pause 5s)

When you are facing a difficult day, you can return to this feeling. You can remember that one small step is enough. That momentum builds. (Pause 5s)

You deserve to move through life with the habits you choose. You deserve the self-improvement that consistency brings. (Pause 3s) The Blueprint of Change has awakened something in you.

That awakening is permanent. You are a person who builds new habits. Believe it.

Live it. (Pause 5s) And whenever the old voice says you cannot do it, you can smile inwardly. You know another way.

You know the blueprint. You take the next step. Again and again.

You choose growth. (Pause 3s) So take this gift with you. The gift of the blueprint.

The gift of the Blueprint of Change. (Pause 5s) Your mind and body have learned something today. They will remember.

When you need to take the next step, you will know how. When you need to build, you will do it. (Pause 3s) You are building a life of self-improvement.

One step at a time. The blueprint is within you. The steps are always clear.

You have momentum. You are the builder. You are growing. (Pause 3s)

From this day forward, let the Blueprint of Change guide you. When you feel stuck, picture the workshop. When you feel impatient, take one small step. (Pause 5s)

You have trained your mind for habit-building. That training will stay with you. (Pause 3s) Honour this change.

Use it. You deserve to build the habits you want. The Blueprint of Change is yours for life. (Pause 3s)

And as we bring you back to full awareness, hold on to that feeling. You are capable. You can take the next step.

You can build this habit. (Pause 5s) Your subconscious will remind you. Whenever doubt rises, you can return to the blueprint.

To the workshop. To the peace of steady progress. (Pause 3s) You are a person who builds new habits.

You have proven it to yourself today. Trust that. Live that.

You have the blueprint. You take the steps. (Pause 3s) The Blueprint of Change is part of you now.

It will be there whenever you close your eyes and seek direction. (Pause 5s) You have taken an important step. You have connected with your ability to build new habits.

Let it guide you. Let it shape your days. You deserve this growth.

You have earned it. The Blueprint of Change is always with you. (Pause 3s) So go forward into your day with this capability.

With this direction. With the knowledge that you can build new habits. (Pause 5s) Your mind has received this training.

It will support you. You are ready. You build habits.

Believe it. (Pause 3s) You have the Blueprint of Change. You have the workshop.

Use them well. You are at ease with growth. You take the next step.

Always. (Pause 3s) Your subconscious holds the image of the blueprint. It will remind you to take small steps.

You are a person who builds new habits. Trust yourself. You have this now.

The blueprint is yours. Growth is your choice. From this day forward.

You are ready. You are the builder. Go in peace.

Small steps compound. Every step you take strengthens the new habit. Patience is part of the blueprint. (Pause 3s)

The workshop is always open. The blueprint is always clear. You have the capability to build any habit you choose. (Pause 5s)

Self-improvement is a journey, not a destination. You are on the path. You are taking the next step.

You are growing. (Pause 3s) The next step is always available. Take it when you are ready.

You are ready."

## Termination

"Now, it is time to gently return to your full waking awareness, bringing with you all the positive feelings of capability, momentum, and steady progress. (Pause 3s) I will count from one to five, and with each number, you will feel more and more alert, refreshed, and ready to engage with your day.

One... beginning to feel a gentle energy returning to your body. You are safe and grounded. Two... becoming more aware of your surroundings, feeling grounded and present in the room.

Three... feeling refreshed and invigorated, carrying your newfound capability to build habits with you into your day. Four... your mind is clear, your body is energised, and you are ready to open your eyes. And five... eyes open, wide awake, feeling absolutely wonderful, capable, and ready to embrace your day with the next step on your blueprint. (Pause 3s)

Remember: the Blueprint of Change is within you. You can build new habits one step at a time."

scripts.title: Mindful Eating
scripts.introduction: This script is designed to help individuals cultivate mindful eating habits, promoting a deeper connection with their food, increased satisfaction, and healthier digestion. It aims to reprogram unconscious eating patterns into conscious, appreciative experiences.
scripts.content:
## Induction - Progressive Relaxation

"As you settle into a comfortable position, allow your eyes to gently close. (Pause 3s) Take a deep, calming breath in through your nose... and as you exhale slowly through your mouth, release any tension you might be holding in your shoulders or your jaw. (Pause 3s) Continue to breathe deeply and evenly, allowing each breath to carry you deeper into relaxation.

With every out-breath, you let go a little more. With every in-breath, you invite calm and stillness. (Pause 5s)

Bring your awareness to your feet. Notice the weight of your feet resting on the floor or the surface beneath you. Feel your toes relaxing... each toe letting go of any tension.

Feel the soles of your feet becoming soft and heavy. Feel your heels sinking... your ankles releasing. (Pause 3s) Let this wave of relaxation move slowly up through your calves, your shins, and your knees.

Your legs feel heavy and relaxed, as if they are gently melting into the support beneath you. (Pause 5s)

Feel your thighs relaxing, becoming soft and loose. This soothing sensation continues into your hips and your lower back, releasing any stiffness or holding. Your abdomen softens... your stomach muscles letting go completely.

Your chest relaxes with each gentle breath. (Pause 3s) Feel the relaxation spreading up your spine, vertebra by vertebra... through your shoulders, and down your arms to your elbows, your forearms, your wrists, and your fingertips. Your arms are loose and heavy. (Pause 5s)

Your neck relaxes... your jaw unclenches... your tongue rests gently in your mouth... your facial muscles soften... your forehead is smooth and calm. Your eyelids feel wonderfully heavy. (Pause 3s) You are now deeply relaxed, peaceful, and calm.

Your whole body feels supported. Your mind is becoming still. (Pause 5s) Every time you breathe out, you go a little deeper.

Deeper and deeper into this safe, comfortable state of relaxation. Nothing can disturb you here. You are safe.

You are at ease. (Pause 5s)"

## Deepener - The Sensory Feast

"Imagine yourself in a serene space. Perhaps a quiet room with soft light, or a peaceful spot in nature. The air is calm.

You feel completely at ease. (Pause 3s) In front of you is a single piece of food. It might be a piece of fruit, a small square of dark chocolate, or a slice of fresh bread. (Pause 3s)

Notice its colours. The way light touches its surface. The subtle variations in hue and shade. (Pause 5s)

Observe its shape. Its curves or edges. The way it rests in your palm or on the plate. (Pause 3s)

Bring it slowly to your nose. Inhale its aroma. Sweet, earthy, fresh, or rich.

Let the scent fill your awareness. (Pause 5s) Notice the texture beneath your fingers or against your lips. Smooth, rough, soft, or crisp. (Pause 3s)

When you are ready, take one small bite. Let it rest on your tongue. Notice the flavours unfolding.

The way your mouth responds. (Pause 5s) There is no rush. No distraction.

Just you and this moment of mindful appreciation. (Pause 3s) As you savour this sensory feast, you feel a deep sense of presence and gratitude. Your body knows how to eat with intention. (Pause 5s)

This feeling draws you deeper into relaxation. The sensory feast is within you now. You can return to it whenever you sit down to eat."

## Therapeutic Content

"Now, in this calm and relaxed state, your relationship with food is gently transforming. (Pause 3s) You recognise that eating can be an act of nourishment and pleasure, not restriction or guilt. (Pause 5s) Old patterns of rushing, distraction, or eating without awareness simply soften and fade.

In their place, a natural desire to eat with intention grows. (Pause 5s) You will find yourself drawn to savouring each mouthful. Noticing the colours, textures, and flavours of your food. (Pause 3s)

Your body has wisdom. It sends signals of hunger and fullness. You are learning to listen.

To pause before eating and ask: am I truly hungry? What does my body need? (Pause 5s) When you eat, you eat.

You put aside screens and distractions. You give your meal your full attention. (Pause 5s) You discover that satisfaction comes not from quantity but from presence.

From truly tasting. From allowing yourself to enjoy. (Pause 3s) From this moment forward, you will find it easier to eat with intention.

You will naturally slow down. You will notice when you are full and honour that signal. (Pause 5s) Food is not the enemy.

It is fuel and joy. Nourishment and pleasure. You deserve to eat without shame. (Pause 3s)

When you feel the old urge to eat quickly or mindlessly, you can picture the sensory feast. You can take one breath. You can bring your awareness to the food in front of you. (Pause 5s)

You are becoming someone who eats with mindfulness. Who savours. Who listens to their body. (Pause 3s)

See yourself tomorrow... sitting down to a meal. You pause. You look at your plate.

You take the first bite with full attention. (Pause 5s) See yourself next week... noticing hunger and fullness more clearly. Choosing to stop when you are satisfied, not when the plate is empty. (Pause 5s)

See yourself in the months to come... your relationship with food feeling calm and positive. No more guilt. No more rushing.

Just gentle, intentional eating. (Pause 3s) Your subconscious has received these suggestions. It will remind you of the sensory feast.

It will help you slow down and savour when the old habit of mindless eating tries to return. (Pause 5s) Eating with intention is a gift you give yourself. It supports digestion.

It increases satisfaction. It reduces the urge to overeat. (Pause 5s) So let this feeling of mindful eating sink in.

You have the capacity to eat with awareness. To enjoy your food fully. To honour your body's signals. (Pause 3s)

The serene space and the single piece of food are within you. Whenever you sit down to eat, you can return to this feeling. (Pause 5s) You deserve to feel satisfied.

You deserve to eat without guilt or rush. (Pause 3s) From this day forward, eating with intention is your default. You are building a relationship with food based on nourishment and joy.

One meal at a time. (Pause 5s) Trust your body. Trust that when you listen, it will guide you.

And in the meantime, you can eat with presence. With savouring. With the knowledge that you are nourishing yourself well. (Pause 5s)

At breakfast, you will take time to taste your first bite. At lunch, you will put aside distractions and focus on your meal. (Pause 3s) At dinner, you will notice the colours and aromas.

You will chew slowly. You will pause between mouthfuls. (Pause 5s) When you snack, you will choose to be present.

One piece at a time. Fully tasted. (Pause 5s) When you feel full, you will honour that signal.

You will stop. You will feel proud of listening to your body. (Pause 3s) Your subconscious is now aligned with mindful eating.

It will remind you of the sensory feast. It will remind you to breathe and notice. It will help you choose presence over distraction. (Pause 5s)

Let that truth settle in. You eat with intention. You savour.

You listen to your body. You have this resource now. Use it well. (Pause 3s)

The sensory feast is yours. It will never judge. It will always remind you: you can eat with awareness.

You can enjoy. You are nourished. (Pause 3s) When you are tempted to eat on the run, you can pause and take one mindful bite.

When you feel the old guilt about food, you can remember that nourishment is kind. When you sit down to a meal, you can give it your full attention. (Pause 5s) Mindful eating is a gift you give yourself.

It calms your nervous system. It increases satisfaction. It helps you feel at peace with food. (Pause 5s)

You may have struggled with your relationship with food in the past. Now you are building a new pattern. One of intention, savouring, and body wisdom. (Pause 3s)

Every time you choose to eat with awareness, you strengthen this new habit. Your subconscious is learning: I can eat slowly. I can savour.

I can listen to my body. (Pause 5s) The world will still offer fast food and distractions. But you no longer have to eat on autopilot.

You can choose presence. (Pause 3s) Some meals will still be rushed by circumstance. Your job is not to be perfect.

scripts.title: Overcoming Procrastination
scripts.introduction: This script is designed to help individuals overcome the habit of procrastination, fostering a sense of motivation, focus, and timely action. It aims to reprogram the subconscious mind to initiate tasks with ease and complete them efficiently.
scripts.content:
## Induction - Progressive Relaxation

"As you settle into a comfortable position, allow your eyes to gently close. (Pause 3s) Take a deep, calming breath in through your nose... and as you exhale slowly through your mouth, release any tension you might be holding in your shoulders or your jaw. (Pause 3s) Continue to breathe deeply and evenly, allowing each breath to carry you deeper into relaxation.

With every out-breath, you let go a little more. With every in-breath, you invite calm and stillness. (Pause 5s)

Bring your awareness to your feet. Notice the weight of your feet resting on the floor or the surface beneath you. Feel your toes relaxing... each toe letting go of any tension.

Feel the soles of your feet becoming soft and heavy. Feel your heels sinking... your ankles releasing. (Pause 3s) Let this wave of relaxation move slowly up through your calves, your shins, and your knees.

Your legs feel heavy and relaxed, as if they are gently melting into the support beneath you. (Pause 5s)

Feel your thighs relaxing, becoming soft and loose. This soothing sensation continues into your hips and your lower back, releasing any stiffness or holding. Your abdomen softens... your stomach muscles letting go completely.

Your chest relaxes with each gentle breath. (Pause 3s) Feel the relaxation spreading up your spine, vertebra by vertebra... through your shoulders, and down your arms to your elbows, your forearms, your wrists, and your fingertips. Your arms are loose and heavy. (Pause 5s)

Your neck relaxes... your jaw unclenches... your tongue rests gently in your mouth... your facial muscles soften... your forehead is smooth and calm. Your eyelids feel wonderfully heavy. (Pause 3s) You are now deeply relaxed, peaceful, and calm.

Your whole body feels supported. Your mind is becoming still. (Pause 5s) Every time you breathe out, you go a little deeper.

Deeper and deeper into this safe, comfortable state of relaxation. Nothing can disturb you here. You are safe.

You are at ease. (Pause 5s)"

## Deepener - The Momentum Engine

"Imagine an engine within you. Not loud or harsh, but steady and reliable. (Pause 3s) It is the part of you that knows how to move forward.

That thrives on initiating action. (Pause 3s) Feel it warming up. A gentle hum.

A sense of readiness. (Pause 5s) This engine does not need to be perfect. It only needs to start.

One turn. One small movement. (Pause 3s) And as it starts, it builds.

Propelling you forward. Not in a rush, but with steady progress. (Pause 5s) You notice how good it feels to be in motion.

The resistance that once held you back softens. (Pause 3s) The momentum engine within you grows stronger with each action you take. It reminds you: the first step is often the easiest once you take it. (Pause 5s)

Let this feeling of forward motion draw you deeper into relaxation. You are connected to your capacity for action. (Pause 3s) The momentum engine is within you now.

You can return to it whenever you need to begin."

## Therapeutic Content

"Now, in this relaxed state, your relationship with tasks and action is gently transforming. (Pause 3s) You recognise that procrastination is a pattern, not a permanent part of who you are. Patterns can change. (Pause 5s)

Old habits of putting things off, waiting for the right moment, or feeling overwhelmed by the whole task simply soften and fade. In their place, a natural willingness to take the first step grows. (Pause 5s) You discover that any task can be broken into steps.

And the first step is always manageable. (Pause 3s) You do not need to see the whole staircase. You only need to take the first step. (Pause 5s)

When you feel the urge to delay, you can pause. Breathe. Ask yourself: what is the very first small thing I could do right now? (Pause 5s)

That first step creates momentum. Once you are in motion, you stay in motion. (Pause 3s) From this moment forward, you will find it easier to initiate.

To begin. To take timely action rather than wait. (Pause 5s) You will feel a quiet satisfaction each time you start.

Each time you complete something. (Pause 3s) When the old urge to procrastinate arises, you can picture the momentum engine. You can feel it warming up.

You can take one small action. (Pause 5s) You are becoming someone who acts. Who begins.

Who experiences the relief and pride of accomplishment. (Pause 3s) See yourself tomorrow... facing a task you might have put off. This time, you break it down.

You take the first step. You feel the engine engage. (Pause 5s) See yourself next week... completing things in good time.

No last-minute rushes. No guilt. Just steady progress. (Pause 5s)

See yourself in the months to come... procrastination losing its grip. You initiate more easily. You feel lighter.

More in control. (Pause 3s) Your subconscious has received these suggestions. It will remind you of the momentum engine.

It will help you take the first step when the old habit of delay tries to return. (Pause 5s) Taking action is a gift you give yourself. It reduces anxiety.

It builds confidence. It creates a sense of accomplishment. (Pause 5s) So let this feeling of momentum sink in.

You have the capacity to begin. To take the first step. To keep moving. (Pause 3s)

The engine is within you. Whenever you feel stuck, you can return to this feeling. You can take one small action. (Pause 5s)

You deserve to feel the satisfaction of timely action. You deserve to be free from the weight of procrastination. (Pause 3s) From this day forward, initiating action is your default.

You are building a life of momentum and accomplishment. One step at a time. (Pause 5s) Trust that the first step is enough.

Trust that momentum will carry you. And in the meantime, you can begin. With ease.

With the knowledge that you are capable. (Pause 5s) At work, you will break projects into steps and start with the easiest one. At home, you will tackle one small task and feel the engine engage. (Pause 3s)

When a task feels big, you will ask: what is the first five-minute step? You will do that. And then the next. (Pause 5s)

When you complete something, you will pause to acknowledge it. You will feel the pride of accomplishment. (Pause 5s) Your subconscious is now aligned with action.

It will remind you of the momentum engine. It will remind you that the first step is the key. It will help you choose to begin rather than delay. (Pause 3s)

Let that truth settle in. You can take the first step. You can build momentum.

You have this resource now. Use it well. (Pause 3s) The momentum engine is yours.

Action creates motivation. The more you practise taking the first step, the more natural it becomes. Your brain learns that starting is safe and that accomplishment feels good.

Timely action reduces the anxiety that comes from leaving things to the last minute. (Pause 5s) Overcoming procrastination is a gift you give yourself. It frees your mind.

It builds self-trust. It creates a life of timely action. (Pause 5s) You may have struggled with procrastination in the past.

Now you are building a new pattern. One of initiation, momentum, and accomplishment. (Pause 3s) Every time you choose to take the first step, you strengthen this new habit.

Your subconscious is learning: I can begin. I can take small steps. I can accomplish. (Pause 5s)

The world will still offer distractions. But you no longer have to be ruled by delay. You can choose to start. (Pause 3s)

Some tasks will still feel daunting. Your job is not to do everything at once. Your job is to take the first step. (Pause 5s)

Each time you initiate, you prove to yourself that momentum is possible. That you can do this. That the old pattern is losing its grip. (Pause 5s)

So hold on to this feeling as we prepare to bring you back. You have connected with the momentum engine. You have connected with your capacity for action. (Pause 5s)

Your mind and body will remember. When the urge to procrastinate arises, you can answer with one small action. With the image of the engine.

With the knowledge that the first step is enough. (Pause 3s) You deserve to feel the relief of timely action. You deserve to accomplish without last-minute stress.

The momentum engine is yours. Use it. Trust it.

You take action now. (Pause 3s) Whenever you listen to this script again, the connection to the momentum engine will deepen. Your capacity to initiate will grow. (Pause 5s)

You are not becoming someone else. You are allowing a part of yourself that has always had the capacity for action to take the lead. (Pause 3s) Many people wait for the perfect moment.

You are choosing to take the first step. To build momentum. To accomplish. (Pause 5s)

The engine is yours. The feeling of forward motion is yours. The pride of accomplishment is yours. (Pause 3s)

So as you go back into your day, carry the momentum engine with you. When you feel stuck, take one small step. Feel the engine engage. (Pause 5s)

You have everything you need to overcome procrastination. You have this experience. You have the image of the momentum engine.

You have the choice, from now on, to begin. (Pause 3s) Let that truth guide you. You can initiate.

You can take the first step. You can accomplish. There is no need to wait.

The first step is always available. (Pause 3s) Your subconscious has received these suggestions. It will support your timely action in the days and weeks to come. (Pause 5s)

When you are tempted to put something off, you can return to this feeling. You can remember that the first step is manageable. That momentum follows action. (Pause 5s)

You deserve to be free from the weight of procrastination. You deserve the satisfaction of accomplishment. (Pause 3s) The momentum engine has awakened something in you.

That awakening is permanent. You take action. Believe it.

Live it. (Pause 5s) And whenever the old habit of delay tries to return, you can smile inwardly. You know another way.

You know the way of the momentum engine. You choose to begin. Again and again.

You choose accomplishment. (Pause 3s) So take this gift with you. The gift of momentum.

The gift of the momentum engine. (Pause 5s) Your mind and body have learned something today. They will remember.

When you need to start, you will take the first step. When you need to keep going, you will feel the engine carry you. (Pause 3s) You are building a life of timely action and accomplishment.

One step at a time. The momentum engine is within you. You can return to it whenever you feel stuck.

You are capable. You are in motion. (Pause 3s) From this day forward, let the momentum engine guide you.

When you feel the urge to procrastinate, picture the engine. Take one small action. (Pause 5s) You have trained your mind for action.

That training will stay with you. (Pause 3s) Honour this change. Use it.

You deserve to accomplish without delay. The momentum engine is yours for life. (Pause 3s) And as we bring you back to full awareness, hold on to that feeling.

You can begin. You can take the first step. You do not need to wait for the perfect moment. (Pause 5s)

Your subconscious will remind you. Whenever procrastination whispers, you can return to the engine. To the first step.

To the peace of momentum. (Pause 3s) You take timely action. You have connected with this today.

Trust that. Live that. You initiate.

You accomplish. You are in motion. (Pause 3s) The momentum engine is part of you now.

It will be there whenever you need to start and feel the pull of delay. (Pause 5s) You have taken an important step. You have connected with your capacity for action.

Let it guide you. Let it ease your days. You deserve this freedom.

You have earned it. The momentum engine is always with you. (Pause 3s) So go forward into your day with this readiness.

With this momentum. With the knowledge that you can take the first step and accomplish. (Pause 5s) Your mind has received this training.

It will support you. You are ready. You take action.

Believe it. (Pause 3s) You have the momentum engine. You have the capacity to begin.

Use them well. You are free from the grip of procrastination. Timely action is your choice.

From this day forward. You are ready. You accomplish.

Go in peace."

## Termination

"Now, it is time to gently return to your full waking awareness, bringing with you all the positive feelings of momentum, action, and accomplishment. (Pause 3s) I will count from one to five, and with each number, you will feel more and more alert, refreshed, and ready to engage with your day.

scripts.title: Healthy Eating Habits
scripts.introduction: This script is designed to help individuals cultivate healthy eating habits, promoting mindful consumption, balanced nutrition, and a positive relationship with food. It aims to reprogram subconscious associations with food choices and foster long-term well-being.
scripts.content:
## Induction - Progressive Relaxation

"As you settle into a comfortable position, allow your eyes to gently close. (Pause 3s) Take a deep, calming breath in through your nose... and as you exhale slowly through your mouth, release any tension you might be holding in your shoulders or your jaw. (Pause 3s) Continue to breathe deeply and evenly, allowing each breath to carry you deeper into relaxation.

With every out-breath, you let go a little more. With every in-breath, you invite calm and stillness. (Pause 5s)

Bring your awareness to your feet. Notice the weight of your feet resting on the floor or the surface beneath you. Feel your toes relaxing... each toe letting go of any tension.

Feel the soles of your feet becoming soft and heavy. Feel your heels sinking... your ankles releasing. (Pause 3s) Let this wave of relaxation move slowly up through your calves, your shins, and your knees.

Your legs feel heavy and relaxed, as if they are gently melting into the support beneath you. (Pause 5s)

Feel your thighs relaxing, becoming soft and loose. This soothing sensation continues into your hips and your lower back, releasing any stiffness or holding. Your abdomen softens... your stomach muscles letting go completely.

Your chest relaxes with each gentle breath. (Pause 3s) Feel the relaxation spreading up your spine, vertebra by vertebra... through your shoulders, and down your arms to your elbows, your forearms, your wrists, and your fingertips. Your arms are loose and heavy. (Pause 5s)

Your neck relaxes... your jaw unclenches... your tongue rests gently in your mouth... your facial muscles soften... your forehead is smooth and calm. Your eyelids feel wonderfully heavy. (Pause 3s) You are now deeply relaxed, peaceful, and calm.

Your whole body feels supported. Your mind is becoming still. (Pause 5s) Every time you breathe out, you go a little deeper.

Deeper and deeper into this safe, comfortable state of relaxation. Nothing can disturb you here. You are safe.

You are at ease. (Pause 5s)"

## Deepener - The Nourishment Garden

"Imagine a garden. Lush and alive. (Pause 3s) All around you are plants heavy with fruits, vegetables, and grains.

Leaves glisten. Colours are rich and natural. (Pause 3s) You feel the fresh earth beneath your feet.

The air is clean and slightly sweet. (Pause 5s) You reach for a ripe fruit. You notice its weight, its colour, its vitality. (Pause 3s)

You pick a vegetable. Fresh. Full of life. (Pause 5s)

The garden is not about restriction. It is about abundance. About foods that nourish and energise. (Pause 3s)

You feel a sense of connection to this place. To the vital energy that flows from the earth into the plants, and from the plants into you. (Pause 5s) This is the nourishment garden.

It represents your body's wisdom. Your natural draw towards what truly feeds you. (Pause 3s) Let this feeling draw you deeper into relaxation.

The nourishment garden is within you now. You can return to it whenever you need to remember what your body loves. (Pause 5s)"

Old patterns of reaching for whatever is convenient, ignoring hunger or thirst, or seeing food as either fuel or guilt simply soften and fade. In their place, a natural desire to make conscious choices grows. (Pause 5s) You will find yourself drawn to fruits, vegetables, grains, and fresh foods.

Not from force, but from a growing sense of what your body enjoys and needs. (Pause 3s) You prioritise hydration. Water becomes a natural part of your day.

Your body thanks you. (Pause 5s) You build sustainable habits. Not strict diets that you cannot maintain, but gentle, repeatable choices that feel good. (Pause 5s)

Food is both fuel and joy. You can enjoy what you eat and nourish your body at the same time. (Pause 3s) From this moment forward, you will find it easier to choose foods that support your energy and wellbeing.

You will notice when you are thirsty and drink. You will plan and enjoy meals that leave you feeling vital. (Pause 5s) When you feel the old pull towards habits that do not serve you, you can picture the nourishment garden.

You can remember the lush plants. The fresh earth. The vital energy. (Pause 3s)

You are becoming someone who eats with awareness. Who chooses consciously. Who treats food as fuel and joy. (Pause 5s)

See yourself tomorrow... choosing a meal that includes fresh, wholesome foods. Feeling satisfied and energised. (Pause 5s) See yourself next week... drinking water throughout the day.

Making conscious choices that feel sustainable. (Pause 5s) See yourself in the months to come... healthy eating habits feeling natural. Your body feeling nourished.

Food as a source of vitality and pleasure. (Pause 3s) Your subconscious has received these suggestions. It will remind you of the nourishment garden.

It will help you choose consciously when old habits try to return. (Pause 5s) Healthy eating habits are a gift you give yourself. They support your energy.

They help you feel your best. They are sustainable because they are built on choice, not deprivation. (Pause 5s) So let this feeling of nourishment sink in.

You have the capacity to choose foods that support you. To hydrate. To build habits that last. (Pause 3s)

The nourishment garden is within you. Whenever you need to make a food choice, you can return to this feeling. (Pause 5s) You deserve to feel vital.

You deserve to eat in a way that supports your wellbeing. (Pause 3s) From this day forward, conscious eating is your default. You are building sustainable habits.

One choice at a time. (Pause 5s) Trust your body's wisdom. Trust that when you listen, you will be drawn to what nourishes you.

And in the meantime, you can choose fresh. You can choose wholesome. You can enjoy. (Pause 5s)

At the shop, you will find yourself reaching for fruits and vegetables. In the kitchen, you will prepare meals that leave you feeling good. (Pause 3s) You will keep water nearby.

You will sip throughout the day. Your body will feel hydrated and clear. (Pause 5s) When you eat, you will notice how different foods make you feel.

You will naturally gravitate towards what gives you energy and satisfaction. (Pause 5s) You recognise that sustainable habits are built slowly. You are not chasing a quick fix.

You are building a way of eating that you can maintain for life. Fresh fruits and vegetables, wholesome grains, and adequate hydration become the foundation. You can still enjoy treats without guilt; balance is the goal.

Your body's wisdom guides you when you listen. You prioritise meals that leave you feeling energised and satisfied. You notice the difference when you choose fresh, wholesome foods and when you stay hydrated.

These choices become second nature over time. You centre your eating around foods that make you feel good and energised. You enjoy the pleasure of eating well.

Your body responds with energy and clarity when you nourish it consciously. Sustainable habits support you for life. (Pause 5s) Your subconscious is now aligned with healthy eating.

It will remind you of the nourishment garden. It will remind you that food is fuel and joy. It will help you make conscious, sustainable choices. (Pause 3s)

Let that truth settle in. You choose nourishing foods. You hydrate.

You build sustainable habits. You have this resource now. Use it well. (Pause 3s)

The nourishment garden is yours. It will never judge. It will always remind you: you can choose what nourishes you.

You can enjoy. You can feel vital. (Pause 3s) When you are tempted by old habits, you can picture the garden.

When you forget to drink, you can return to the image of vitality. When you choose a wholesome meal, you can feel proud. (Pause 5s) Healthy eating habits are a gift you give yourself.

They support your mood. Your energy. Your long-term wellbeing. (Pause 5s)

I can feel vital. (Pause 5s) The world will still offer quick fixes and treats. But you no longer have to be on autopilot.

You can choose consciously. (Pause 3s) Some days will still be busy. Your job is not to be perfect.

Your job is to make the next choice a conscious one. (Pause 5s) Each time you choose nourishment, you prove to yourself that healthy habits are possible. That you can do this.

That the old pattern is losing its grip. (Pause 5s) So hold on to this feeling as we prepare to bring you back. You have connected with the nourishment garden.

You have connected with healthy eating habits. (Pause 5s) Your mind and body will remember. When old habits call, you can answer with the image of the garden.

With the knowledge that you can choose. With the feeling of vitality. (Pause 3s) You deserve to feel nourished.

You deserve sustainable habits. The nourishment garden is yours. Use it.

Trust it. You eat for vitality now. (Pause 3s) Whenever you listen to this script again, the connection to the nourishment garden will deepen.

Your healthy habits will strengthen. (Pause 5s) You are not becoming someone else. You are allowing your body's natural wisdom to guide you. (Pause 3s)

Many people eat without considering how food makes them feel. You are choosing to listen. To choose consciously.

To nourish. (Pause 5s) The nourishment garden is yours. The feeling of vitality is yours.

The joy of food as fuel and pleasure is yours. (Pause 3s) So as you go back into your day, carry the nourishment garden with you. When you make a food choice, pause.

Remember the garden. Choose consciously. (Pause 5s) You have everything you need for healthy eating habits.

You have this experience. You have the image of the nourishment garden. You have the choice, from now on, to nourish yourself well. (Pause 3s)

Let that truth guide you. You choose nourishing foods. You hydrate.

You build sustainable habits. Food is fuel and joy. You are vital. (Pause 3s)

Your subconscious has received these suggestions. It will support your healthy eating in the days and weeks to come. (Pause 5s) When you are tempted to slip into old habits, you can return to this feeling.

You can remember the garden. That you can choose. That nourishment feels good. (Pause 5s)

You deserve to feel your best. You deserve habits that are sustainable and kind. (Pause 3s) The nourishment garden has opened something in you.

That opening is permanent. You choose nourishment. Believe it.

Live it. (Pause 5s) And whenever the world offers quick, less nourishing options, you can smile inwardly. You know what your body loves.

You know the nourishment garden. You choose vitality. Again and again.

You choose conscious eating. (Pause 3s) So take this gift with you. The gift of the nourishment garden.

The gift of healthy eating habits. (Pause 5s) Your mind and body have learned something today. They will remember.

When you eat, you will choose consciously. When you need to hydrate, you will drink. (Pause 3s) You are building sustainable healthy eating habits.

One choice at a time. The nourishment garden is within you. You can return to it whenever you eat.

You are nourished. You are vital. (Pause 3s) From this day forward, let the nourishment garden guide you.

When you make a food choice, picture the garden. When you forget to drink, remember vitality. (Pause 5s) You have trained your mind for conscious eating.

That training will stay with you. (Pause 3s) Honour this change. Use it.

You deserve to feel nourished and vital. The nourishment garden is yours for life. (Pause 3s) And as we bring you back to full awareness, hold on to that feeling.

You can choose nourishing foods. You can hydrate. You can build sustainable habits. (Pause 5s)

Your subconscious will remind you. Whenever you eat, you can return to the nourishment garden. To the vital energy.

To the peace of conscious choice. (Pause 3s) You have healthy eating habits. You have connected with this today.

Trust that. Live that. You nourish yourself.

You feel vital. Food is fuel and joy. (Pause 3s) The nourishment garden is part of you now.

It will be there whenever you need to remember what your body loves. (Pause 5s) You have taken an important step. You have connected with the nourishment garden.

Let it guide you. Let it support your wellbeing. You deserve this vitality.

You have earned it. The nourishment garden is always with you. (Pause 3s) So go forward into your day with this awareness.

With this vitality. With the knowledge that you can choose nourishing foods and enjoy them. (Pause 5s) Your mind has received this training.

It will support you. You are ready. You eat for vitality.

Believe it. (Pause 3s) You have the nourishment garden. You have the capacity to choose well.

Use them well. You are nourished. Healthy habits are your choice.

From this day forward. You are ready. You are vital.

Go in peace."

Four... your mind is clear, your body is energised, and you are ready to open your eyes. And five... eyes open, wide awake, feeling absolutely wonderful, nourished, and ready to make conscious, healthy choices with ease. (Pause 3s)

Remember: the nourishment garden is within you. Food is fuel and joy."
