You are at ease. (Pause 5s)"

## Deepener - The Release of Burden

"Imagine yourself standing in a quiet, peaceful space. You notice something on your shouldersa weight you have been carrying. It may be old guilt.

Old shame. The burden of past mistakes. (Pause 3s) You are not here to be judged.

You are here to release. (Pause 3s) A soft, forgiving light begins to glow around you. It is warm.

It is kind. It does not condemn. It simply offers release. (Pause 5s)

You feel the weight on your shoulders beginning to loosen. You are not erasing the past. You are simply allowing yourself to put down what you no longer need to carry. (Pause 5s)

With each breath out, the burden becomes lighter. The forgiving light fills you with a sense of acceptance. Of self-compassion.

Of emotional freedom. (Pause 3s) The release of burden is within you now. The forgiving light is always available.

You can return to this place whenever you need to let go of guilt and shame. (Pause 5s)"

## Therapeutic Content

"Now, in this relaxed and open state, feel a deep sense of self-forgiveness awakening within you. (Pause 3s) You recognise that you are human. You have made mistakes.

So has everyone. Guilt and shame have served their purposethey have taught you. Now you are allowed to release them. (Pause 5s)

Any old burdens of guilt, shame, or the belief that you do not deserve peace simply soften and fade. In their place, acceptance and self-compassion grow. (Pause 5s) Imagine yourself putting down a heavy bag you have been carrying for a long time.

Your shoulders relax. Your chest opens. You can breathe more freely. (Pause 3s)

You do not have to forget the past. You can learn from it. But you do not have to punish yourself forever.

You are allowed to release old burdens. (Pause 5s) From this moment forward, you will find it easier to release guilt and shame. You will offer yourself the same compassion you might offer a friend.

You will accept that you are worthy of emotional freedom. (Pause 5s) Your self-forgiveness will grow. Not because you are denying wrongs, but because you are choosing to stop carrying them as weapons against yourself. (Pause 3s)

When you feel the old grip of guilt or shame, you can picture the forgiving light. You can breathe. You can remember: I am allowed to let go.

I am allowed to forgive myself. (Pause 5s) You are becoming a person who can release old burdens. A person who can accept themselves.

Who can live with self-compassion and emotional freedom. (Pause 3s) See yourself tomorrow... when a memory of a past mistake arises. This time, you do not spiral into shame.

You acknowledge. You learn. You release. (Pause 5s)

See yourself next week... in a situation that would once have triggered guilt. Instead of punishing yourself, you offer yourself kindness. You remember the forgiving light. (Pause 5s)

See yourself in the months to come... lighter. Freer. Carrying less of the past.

Living more in the present with acceptance and self-compassion. (Pause 3s) Your subconscious has received these suggestions. It will remind you of the release of burden.

It will help you choose self-forgiveness when the old habit of guilt or shame tries to return. (Pause 5s) Releasing guilt and shame is not the same as ignoring responsibility. It is the choice to stop suffering beyond what is necessary.

To allow yourself to heal. (Pause 5s) So let this feeling of release sink in. You deserve to put down old burdens.

You deserve self-forgiveness. You deserve emotional freedom. (Pause 3s) The forgiving light is within you.

Whenever you need to remember, you can close your eyes and feel the weight lifting. See the light. (Pause 5s) You deserve to live without the constant weight of guilt and shame.

You deserve the peace that comes from self-acceptance. (Pause 3s) From this day forward, self-forgiveness is a choice you can make. You are building a life of self-compassion and emotional freedom.

One release at a time. (Pause 5s) When you think of something you have done wrong, you can acknowledge it. You can make amends if needed.

And you can choose to stop punishing yourself. (Pause 5s) When shame risesthe feeling that you are fundamentally flawedyou can challenge it. You are not your worst moment.

You are a person who has made mistakes and who can grow. (Pause 3s) With others you have hurt, you can take responsibility without drowning in guilt. You can apologise.

You can change. You can also forgive yourself. (Pause 5s) When you notice yourself returning to old guilt, you can pause.

You can breathe. You can remember the release of burden. The forgiving light. (Pause 5s)

Your subconscious is now aligned with self-forgiveness. It will remind you of the release. It will help you choose self-compassion when the old habit of self-punishment tries to return. (Pause 3s)

Let that truth settle in. You are allowed to release guilt and shame. You are allowed to forgive yourself.

You have this resource now. Use it well. (Pause 3s) The release of burden is yours.

The forgiving light is yours. The emotional freedom that comes from self-acceptance is yours. (Pause 3s) When you make a new mistake, you can learn from it without adding it to an endless pile of shame.

When someone else holds a grudge, you can still choose to release your own self-blame. (Pause 5s) Self-compassion is a gift you give yourself. It does not make you selfish.

It makes you able to show up fully for yourself and others. (Pause 5s) You may have believed that you deserve to carry guilt and shame. Now you know that you deserve to release them.

That you can forgive yourself. (Pause 3s) Every time you choose to put down the burdento offer yourself forgiveness, to refuse to spiral into shameyou strengthen this new habit. Your subconscious is learning: I can release.

I can forgive myself. I can be free. (Pause 5s) The past will still have happened.

Your job is not to erase it. Your job is to stop carrying it as a permanent weight. To allow yourself to heal. (Pause 3s)

Each time you succeed, you prove to yourself that release is possible. That you can do this. That the forgiving light is real. (Pause 5s)

So hold on to this feeling as we prepare to bring you back. You have connected with the release of burden. You have connected with self-forgiveness. (Pause 5s)

Your mind and body will remember. When guilt or shame rises, you can return to the forgiving light. To the release.

To the knowledge that you are allowed to let go. (Pause 3s) You deserve to feel free. You deserve self-compassion.

The release of burden is yours. Use it. Trust it.

You are releasing guilt and shame now. (Pause 3s) Whenever you listen to this script again, the connection to the forgiving light will deepen. Your capacity for self-forgiveness will grow. (Pause 5s)

You are not becoming someone who ignores the past. You are becoming someone who learns from it and then allows themselves to be free. (Pause 3s) Acceptance does not mean approval of every past action.

It means accepting that you are human. That you can grow. That you deserve peace. (Pause 5s)

The release is yours. The forgiving light is yours. The feeling of emotional freedom is yours. (Pause 3s)

So as you go back into your day, carry the release with you. When you feel the first flicker of guilt or shame, pause. Breathe.

Remember the forgiving light. (Pause 5s) You have everything you need to release guilt and shame. You have this experience.

You have the image of the release. You have the choice, from now on, to forgive yourself. (Pause 3s) Let that truth guide you.

You can release old burdens. You can accept yourself. You can live with self-compassion and emotional freedom. (Pause 3s)

Your subconscious has received these suggestions. It will support your self-forgiveness in the days and weeks to come. (Pause 5s) When you are triggered by a memory, when you feel the weight of shame, or when you simply need to let go, you can return to this feeling.

You can remember the release of burden. (Pause 5s) You deserve to live without the constant weight of guilt and shame. You deserve the emotional freedom that comes from self-forgiveness. (Pause 3s)

The release has opened something in you. That opening is permanent. You are a person who can forgive yourself.

Believe it. Live it. (Pause 5s) And whenever the old guilt or shame tries to return, you can picture the forgiving light.

You know another way. You know the way of release. You choose self-forgiveness.

Again and again. You choose freedom. (Pause 3s) So take this gift with you.

The gift of the release of burden. The gift of self-forgiveness. (Pause 5s) Your mind and body have learned something today.

They will remember. When you need to let go, you will have the release. When you need to forgive yourself, you will have the forgiving light. (Pause 3s)

You are building a life of self-compassion and emotional freedom. One release at a time. The forgiving light is within you.

You can return to it whenever you need. You are allowed to release. You are allowed to forgive yourself. (Pause 3s)

From this day forward, let the release of burden guide you. When you feel guilty, picture the forgiving light. When you feel shame, take a breath and remember: I am allowed to let go. (Pause 5s)

You have trained your mind for self-forgiveness. That training will stay with you. (Pause 3s) Honour this change.

Use it. You deserve to live without the weight of old guilt and shame. The release is yours for life. (Pause 3s)

And as we bring you back to full awareness, hold on to that feeling. You are lighter. You can forgive yourself.

You do not have to carry old burdens forever. (Pause 5s) Your subconscious will remind you. Whenever guilt or shame rises, you can return to the release.

To the forgiving light. To the peace of self-acceptance. (Pause 3s) You are releasing guilt and shame.

You have connected with that truth today. Trust that. Live that.

The release is there. You can put down the burden. You choose self-forgiveness. (Pause 3s)

The release of burden is part of you now. It will be there whenever you close your eyes and seek emotional freedom. (Pause 5s) You have taken an important step.

You have connected with self-forgiveness. Let it guide you. Let it lighten your days.

You deserve this freedom. You have the right to release. The forgiving light is always with you. (Pause 3s)

So go forward into your day with this lightness. With this self-compassion. With the knowledge that you can release old burdens. (Pause 5s)

Your mind has received this training. It will support you. You are ready.

You are worthy of self-forgiveness. Believe it. (Pause 3s) You have the release.

You have the forgiving light. Use them well. You are free to let go.

You can forgive yourself. Emotional freedom is your choice. (Pause 3s) Your subconscious holds the image of the release of burden.

It will remind you to put down the weight. You are releasing guilt and shame. Trust yourself.

You have this now. The forgiving light is yours. Self-forgiveness is your choice.

From this day forward. You are ready. You are free.

Go in peace."

## Termination

"Now, it is time to gently return to your full waking awareness, bringing with you all the positive feelings of release, self-forgiveness, and emotional freedom. (Pause 3s) I will count from one to five, and with each number, you will feel more and more alert, refreshed, and ready to engage with your day.

One... beginning to feel a gentle energy returning to your body. You are safe and grounded. Two... becoming more aware of your surroundings, feeling grounded and present in the room.

Three... feeling refreshed and lighter, carrying your self-forgiveness and release with you into your day. Four... your mind is clear, your body is energised, and you are ready to open your eyes. And five... eyes open, wide awake, feeling absolutely wonderful, free, and ready to embrace your day with self-compassion and emotional freedom. (Pause 3s)

Remember: the release of burden and the forgiving light are within you. You can let go of guilt and shame. You can forgive yourself."

scripts.title: Positive Body Image
scripts.introduction: This script helps individuals develop a healthy, accepting relationship with their body. It aims to reduce negative self-judgement about physical appearance and cultivate genuine appreciation for the body's strength and capabilities.
scripts.content:
## Induction - Embrace Tranquillity

Begin by finding a comfortable position... perhaps lying down or sitting in a supportive chair. (Pause 3s) Allow your eyes to gently close, feeling the weight of your eyelids... softly, naturally. (Pause 5s)

Take a deep breath in... and as you exhale, release any tension you might be holding. (Pause 3s) With each breath, feel yourself sinking deeper... into a state of calmness and peace. (Pause 5s)

Now, bring your awareness to your toes... let them soften and relax. (Pause 3s) Imagine a gentle wave of tranquillity washing over your feet... soothing and calming. (Pause 5s)

Feel this sensation begin to travel upwards... through your ankles, releasing any tension. (Pause 3s) Your calves are bathed in a warm, comforting glow... every muscle unwinding. (Pause 5s)

Notice your knees... as if they are floating in a sea of serenity. (Pause 3s) Relaxation flows easily... into your thighs, loosening any tightness. (Pause 5s)

Your hips sink deeper... letting go of any remaining stress. (Pause 3s) Feel the warmth spreading across your abdomen... enveloping you in a cocoon of ease. (Pause 5s)

As the calmness reaches your chest... breathe deeply, feeling the soothing rhythm of your breath. (Pause 3s) Your heart beats gently... in perfect harmony with this peaceful moment. (Pause 5s)

Let the relaxation flow into your shoulders... allowing them to drop and release all burdens. (Pause 3s) Feel it cascade down your arms... through your elbows, wrists, and into each finger, like a gentle stream. (Pause 5s)

Notice your neck... as tension dissolves, leaving you feeling light and free. (Pause 3s) Allow this sense of calm to spread across your face... smoothing away any tightness in your jaw and forehead. (Pause 5s)

Your scalp tingles with relaxation... as though kissed by a cool, gentle breeze. (Pause 3s) The soothing sensation wraps around your entire head... grounding you in this moment of peace. (Pause 5s)

Your mind is calm... thoughts drift by like soft clouds in a clear sky. (Pause 3s) You are enveloped in a comforting stillness... a tranquil space where only calmness resides. (Pause 5s)

Feel the depth of this serenity... grounding you to the Earth, yet lifting your spirit. (Pause 3s) Every part of your being is relaxed... from the tips of your toes to the crown of your head. (Pause 5s)

You are present in this moment... a moment of deep relaxation and peace. (Pause 3s) As you rest here, allow yourself to embrace the sense of wellbeing that flows through you. (Pause 5s)

Know that this tranquillity is yours to return to... whenever you choose. (Pause 3s) With each breath, you are inviting more peace into your life... more calm, more balance. (Pause 5s)

In this serene state, you are open to positive thoughts... open to embracing a healthy, positive body image. (Pause 3s) Feel the warmth of self-acceptance growing within you... with each gentle breath. (Pause 5s)

Rest here in this beautiful stillness... knowing you are safe, you are whole, you are enough. (Pause 3s) Allow the positivity to flow through you... embracing every part of your being. (Pause 5s)

## Deepener - The Mirror of the Soul

Imagine yourself standing in a serene, sunlit garden... a haven of peace and tranquillity... (Pause 3s) Surrounded by vibrant flowers and lush greenery... you feel a gentle breeze caress your skin, whispering soft secrets of the earth... (Pause 5s) Each breath you take nourishes your spirit, filling you with the essence of life... an essence that flows through every part of you... (Pause 3s)

In this garden, you discover a beautiful, ornate mirror... its frame entwined with delicate vines and blossoms... (Pause 5s) This is not an ordinary mirror... for it reflects the truth of who you are... beyond the surface... beyond appearances... (Pause 3s) As you gaze into the mirror, you see your image begin to shift and transform... revealing the radiant energy within... (Pause 5s)

The mirror shows you the strength of a mountain... solid and unwavering... (Pause 3s) You feel the power in your legs, strong as ancient roots grounding you to the earth... (Pause 5s) Your arms, like the branches of a mighty tree, reach out to embrace the world... offering shelter and support... (Pause 3s)

With each breath, your chest expands like a vast horizon... open and limitless... (Pause 5s)

Notice the gentle rhythm of your heartbeat... a steady drum that has accompanied you through every moment of your life... (Pause 3s) It echoes the song of the universe... a melody of existence and continuity... (Pause 5s) Your skin, a tapestry woven with stories of sunlit days and starry nights... testifies to your journey and resilience... (Pause 3s)

As you continue to look, the mirror reveals the beauty of the ocean within you... ever-changing, yet constant in its depth and wonder... (Pause 5s) Your eyes, like shimmering seas, reflect the light of your inner wisdom and compassion... (Pause 3s) They are windows to your soul... a soul that loves and forgives... (Pause 5s)

Feel the warmth of self-compassion enveloping you... like a gentle embrace that holds you softly... (Pause 3s) Allow yourself to let go of comparisons... for no two flowers in this garden are the same... each one unique in its beauty... each one perfect in its being... (Pause 5s) Appreciate the miracle of your body... for what it can do... for the experiences it allows you to feel... (Pause 3s)

In the mirror, you see your true self... a harmonious blend of strength and grace... (Pause 5s) You are more than a reflection... more than an image... you are a living, breathing masterpiece... (Pause 3s) Know that you are enough... just as you are... in this moment... and always... (Pause 5s)

As you begin to step away from the mirror... carry with you the peace of this garden... the truth of your beauty... and the love for yourself that is ever-present... (Pause 3s) With each step, feel lighter... more at ease with who you are... knowing that you are cherished... (Pause 5s) And as you leave this sacred space, remember... the mirror of the soul is always within you... reflecting your true essence... wherever you go... (Pause 5s)

## Therapeutic Content

As you settle into a state of calm and ease... allowing your breath to guide you deeper... you begin to connect with a profound sense of acceptance... (Pause 3s) An acceptance of where you are now... and the journey that has led you here... (Pause 5s) You acknowledge the thoughts and feelings you've held about your body... recognising that they are just thoughts... and like a gentle breeze, they can change direction... (Pause 3s)

Within this tranquil space, imagine standing before a mirror... but this is no ordinary mirror... (Pause 5s) This mirror reflects more than the surface... it reveals the beauty of your essence... the strength and resilience that resides within... (Pause 3s) As you gaze into this mirror, you see your true beauty shining through... not defined by societal standards... but by the unique light that is you... (Pause 5s)

Your body... this incredible vessel... has carried you through every moment of your life... (Pause 3s) It moves with grace... even when you may not notice it... It breathes life into your dreams... supports your laughter and your tears... (Pause 5s)

Allow yourself to appreciate all that your body can do... each heartbeat, each breath, a testament to your vitality... (Pause 3s)

Feel the warmth of self-compassion beginning to grow... like a gentle flame... (Pause 5s) You are learning to be kind to yourself... recognising that you deserve the same love and respect you offer to others... (Pause 3s) Notice how this self-compassion transforms the way you see yourself... replacing judgement with understanding... (Pause 5s)

As you continue to look in the mirror... you realise that comparison is no longer necessary... (Pause 3s) Just as each flower in a garden blooms differently... each body has its own unique beauty... (Pause 5s) You let go of the need to compare... embracing the idea that your worth is not measured by comparison... but by your own intrinsic value... (Pause 3s)

Imagine now... your body as a wise and loyal friend... always supporting you... always present... (Pause 5s) You begin to listen to its wisdom... honouring its needs and celebrating its strengths... (Pause 3s) This friendship grows stronger with each moment of acceptance... with each act of kindness you show yourself... (Pause 5s)

Feel the release of old patterns that no longer serve you... they drift away like autumn leaves... leaving space for new growth... (Pause 3s) You are planting seeds of self-acceptance... nourishing them with positive thoughts and gentle affirmations... (Pause 5s) These seeds will grow... blossoming into a renewed sense of confidence and joy in your own skin... (Pause 3s)

Allow yourself to be present in this experience... knowing that each step you take towards self-acceptance is significant... (Pause 5s) You are moving away from criticism... towards a place of peace and self-love... (Pause 3s) As you do, notice how your perception begins to shift... opening to a world where you are enough... exactly as you are... (Pause 5s)

In this serene space, you are free to let go of any burdens... releasing them into the gentle currents of your breath... (Pause 3s) Feel the lightness that comes with acceptance... the freedom in knowing you are perfectly imperfect... (Pause 5s) You embrace this truth... allowing it to guide you towards a deeper love for yourself... (Pause 3s)

With each breath, you deepen this connection... to your body, your mind, your spirit... (Pause 5s) You are whole... and complete... and deserving of all the love and kindness the world has to offer... (Pause 3s) As you continue this journey, remember that the mirror of your mind reflects the beauty that lies within... always waiting to be seen... (Pause 5s)

As you journey forward, imagine waking up tomorrow with a newfound sense of ease and acceptance... You might glance in the mirror and see yourself in a gentle, loving light... A reflection of strength, resilience, and beauty that radiates from within... (Pause 3s)

Picture yourself next week, moving through your day with grace... Each step you take grounded in appreciation for all your body allows you to do... Walking through a park, feeling the earth beneath your feet, the breeze on your skin, and acknowledging how your body supports you in experiencing the world... (Pause 5s)

In the months ahead, envisage yourself participating in activities that bring you joy and vitality... Perhaps a dance class, where you feel the rhythm and energy flowing through you, celebrating movement rather than appearance... Or a yoga session, where each pose is a tribute to your body's capabilities and strength... (Pause 3s)

Now, imagine social situations where, instead of comparing yourself to others, you focus on the warmth of connections... Conversations flow easily, and you appreciate others for who they are, just as you appreciate yourself... (Pause 5s)

Each time you pass by a mirror, let it be a reminder of your true beauty... As you look into the mirror, see reflected not just a physical form, but a being of light and love... A person worthy of self-compassion and kindness... (Pause 3s)

These mirrors in your life are your allies, reflecting back the truth of your inner beauty... Whenever you catch your reflection, take a deep breath and anchor this feeling of appreciation and acceptance... (Pause 5s)

You can use a simple gesture, like gently touching your heart, to remind yourself of this acceptance... This gesture becomes a trigger for self-compassion, allowing you to reconnect with your inner strength and worth whenever you need it... (Pause 3s)

Remember, you are capable of choosing thoughts that empower you... Thoughts that celebrate your body's abilities rather than its appearance... Each day, you grow more attuned to the unique and beautiful essence that is you... (Pause 5s)

Feel the power of your mind to focus on what truly matters... Your kindness, your courage, your ability to love and be loved... These qualities define you far more than any external measure... (Pause 3s)

In moments of doubt, recall the truth that you are enough, just as you are... Let this affirmation become a mantra, echoing softly in your mind, bringing peace and reassurance... (Pause 5s)

You are resilient, capable of facing challenges and emerging stronger... You have within you all the resources needed to nurture a positive body image... Trust in your journey and the unfolding of your unique path... (Pause 3s)

As you continue to grow, you may find yourself naturally letting go of comparisons... Embracing instead the freedom that comes with self-acceptance... (Pause 5s)

In all your endeavours, carry forward this sense of confidence and self-compassion... Knowing that you are deserving of all the good things life has to offer... (Pause 3s)

And now, as you prepare to return to the present moment, carry with you this renewed sense of appreciation for your body and your being... (Pause 5s)

Open your heart to the possibility of seeing beauty in each moment... In every experience, find gratitude for the life you live and the body that supports you... (Pause 3s)

Your journey is just beginning, and with each step, you grow more aligned with a positive body image... More in tune with the vibrant, capable, and beautiful person you are... (Pause 5s)

Feel the strength within you, knowing you can access this inner power whenever you choose... Let this strength guide you, inspire you, and lead you to a place of self-love and acceptance... (Pause 3s)

As you now prepare to return to full awareness, know that you carry with you the tools of self-compassion and appreciation... Ready to use them in your daily life to reinforce and sustain this positive body image... (Pause 5s)

With a final deep breath, fill your lungs with the air of confidence and calm... Exhale, releasing any lingering doubts or negativity... (Pause 3s)

When you are ready, bring your awareness back to the room, feeling refreshed, empowered, and ready to embrace your world with a renewed perspective... (Pause 5s)

## Termination

As you begin to return to full awareness, feel the warmth of positivity enveloping you... (Pause 3s) In a moment, I will count from one to five, and with each number, you will become more aware, more present... (Pause 3s)

One... feeling the gentle energy flowing through your body, revitalising you... (Pause 3s) Two... bringing with you a profound sense of appreciation for your body and all it does for you... (Pause 5s)

Three... gently becoming more aware of the space around you, feeling grounded and secure... (Pause 3s) Four... allowing a deep breath to fill your lungs, invigorating your mind and spirit... (Pause 5s)

Five... eyes open, fully awake, carrying with you the positive affirmations of love and respect for your body... (Pause 3s)

Embrace this newfound appreciation, for you are unique and wonderful just as you are... (Pause 5s) Let this feeling of acceptance and positivity guide you through each day, nurturing your self-image with kindness and compassion... (Pause 3s)

Remember, you have the power to see yourself with love... with gratitude... and with joy... (Pause 5s) Every step forward is a step towards a more positive, fulfilling life.

scripts.title: Calm and Confident Birth
scripts.introduction: This script is designed for expectant mothers preparing for labour and delivery. It promotes deep relaxation, confidence in the body's natural birthing ability, and a calm, positive mindset for the birthing experience.
scripts.content:
## Induction - Journey to Tranquil Shores

Allow yourself to settle into the comforting embrace of the chair... feeling its gentle support beneath you... (Pause 3s) Begin to bring your attention to your breath... noticing each inhalation... each exhalation... (Pause 5s)

As you breathe in... feel a sense of calm flowing into your body... and as you breathe out... let go of any tension... any stress... (Pause 3s) With each breath... you become more relaxed... more at ease... (Pause 5s)

Now... imagine a warm, gentle wave of relaxation beginning at your toes... (Pause 3s) Feel this soothing wave envelop your toes... releasing any tightness... any tension... (Pause 5s) Allow this relaxation to flow upwards... into your feet... letting go of any discomfort... as your feet become heavy... and relaxed... (Pause 3s)

This calming wave continues its journey... moving slowly up into your ankles... wrapping them in warmth and comfort... (Pause 5s) Feel your ankles soften... as they let go of all strain... (Pause 3s)

As the wave progresses... it travels up into your calves... soothing every muscle... every fibre... (Pause 5s) Feel the weight of your calves increasing... as they relax deeper... (Pause 3s)

The relaxation travels upwards... into your knees... where it gently loosens and releases any tension... (Pause 5s) Your knees feel supple... supported... at peace... (Pause 3s)

Now the warm wave of relaxation moves into your thighs... (Pause 5s) Feel it spread... dissolving any stress... any strain... as your thighs become soft... and heavy... (Pause 3s)

With each breath... the relaxation deepens... flowing into your hips... (Pause 5s) Feel your hips grounding into the chair... releasing all tension... embracing this calm... (Pause 3s)

The wave continues to rise... enveloping your lower back... soothing and relaxing every muscle... (Pause 5s) Your lower back feels at ease... supported... as every worry melts away... (Pause 3s)

Allow this gentle wave to flow upwards... into your abdomen... (Pause 5s) Feel it calming every sensation... every movement... as your abdomen relaxes... and breathes freely... (Pause 3s)

The relaxation now spreads into your chest... (Pause 5s) With each breath... feel your chest expand with calm... and contract with peace... (Pause 3s)

As the wave journeys upwards... it reaches your shoulders... (Pause 5s) Let go of any burden... as your shoulders soften... and drop... (Pause 3s)

Feel this wave of tranquillity continue down your arms... (Pause 5s) Flowing through your elbows... into your wrists... and hands... (Pause 3s) Each finger... each joint... releasing... relaxing... (Pause 5s)

The calming wave moves to your neck... soothing every muscle... every nerve... (Pause 3s) Your neck feels free... light... as it lets go of any tension... (Pause 5s)

Finally... the wave reaches your head... enveloping your scalp... your forehead... (Pause 3s) Feel the relaxation smoothing away any lines of tension... (Pause 5s) Your jaw... your cheeks... your eyes... all relaxing... (Pause 3s)

You are now deeply relaxed... enveloped in a cocoon of calm... and confidence... (Pause 5s) Ready to continue your journey... with serenity... and strength...

## Deepener - Ocean of Serenity

Imagine now... you are standing on the soft, warm sands of a tranquil beach... The sun gently caresses your skin... as a gentle breeze whispers through your hair... (Pause 3s)

Before you stretches an endless ocean... its waves dancing rhythmically towards the shore... Each wave, like a surge of calm energy... rolling in and out... (Pause 5s)

Feel the ground beneath your feet... solid and supportive... just as your body is strong and capable... Trust in the rhythm of the waves... trust in the wisdom of your body... (Pause 5s)

As you watch the waves... rising and falling... you notice how each one is unique... yet part of a harmonious whole... just as each sensation you experience... is part of your bodys natural rhythm... (Pause 3s)

With each breath, you breathe in the salty sea air... clear and refreshing... filling your lungs with calm and confidence... As you exhale, release any tension... any concern... allowing it to drift away... like a cloud on the horizon... (Pause 5s)

Feel the waves within you... flowing in perfect harmony... You are in tune with nature... with the powerful forces of creation... Each wave brings you closer to meeting your baby... (Pause 3s)

Visualise each surge... like a wave approaching the shore... building gently... rising with grace... and then receding softly... carrying you towards a place of peace and assurance... (Pause 5s)

Imagine yourself floating effortlessly... on this ocean of serenity... Your body buoyant and supported... cradled by the water... Secure in the knowledge that you are safe... and capable... (Pause 3s)

As the waves move through you... imagine them washing away any remnants of doubt... each surge a step closer... to the moment you hold your baby in your arms... Feel the energy within you... powerful and serene... (Pause 5s)

Allow your breathing to synchronise with the waves... slow and steady... inhaling deeply as the wave rises... exhaling as it gently falls... (Pause 3s)

Feel the connection between you and the ocean... between you and the generations of women who have birthed before you... their strength and wisdom flowing through you... (Pause 5s)

In this moment, as you float... you are calm... you are confident... knowing that you are preparing for a serene and empowered birth... (Pause 3s)

Visualise your birth journey unfolding... like the sun rising over the ocean... its light casting a golden path across the water... guiding you towards a new beginning... (Pause 5s)

Feel the warmth of the sun... the support of the sand... the gentle embrace of the water... all working together... in perfect harmony for a calm and confident birth... (Pause 3s)

As you prepare to emerge from this deep relaxation... take with you the strength and serenity of the ocean... the assurance that your body knows what to do... and the joy of welcoming your baby into this world... (Pause 5s)

And when you are ready... gently return to the present... bringing with you the calm confidence... of this peaceful ocean experience...

## Therapeutic Content

As you settle into this peaceful space... your body begins to relax... just as it knows how to do so naturally... (Pause 3s) You have already embarked on a remarkable journey... one of strength and transformation... (Pause 5s) Each breath you take is a step towards a calm and confident birth... a birth that is uniquely yours... (Pause 3s)

Imagine yourself standing at the edge of a serene ocean... the waves gently caressing the shore... (Pause 5s) Just like these waves... your body moves in its own beautiful rhythm... (Pause 3s) Each surge is a wave of energy... bringing your baby closer to you... (Pause 5s)

You are one with this rhythm... with every breath you ride the wave... feeling calm... feeling confident... (Pause 3s)

You may have noticed sensations... different from anything you have felt before... (Pause 5s) And it's perfectly alright to feel uncertain at times... to wonder how you will navigate this journey... (Pause 3s) Yet deep within... you possess an incredible power... a wisdom that guides you... (Pause 5s)

Trust in your body's innate ability... trust in the natural process unfolding within you... (Pause 3s)

See yourself walking along a sandy beach... the grains of sand soft beneath your feet... (Pause 5s) Just as the sand adjusts and forms underfoot... your body adapts to each moment... effortlessly... (Pause 3s) With every step... you become more attuned to the gentle flow of life within you... (Pause 5s)

Feel the sun warming your skin... the breeze whispering through the air... reminding you of your strength... your resilience... (Pause 3s)

As each surge arises... you breathe deeply... allowing the sensation to pass through you... like a wave returning to the ocean... (Pause 5s) With each breath... you release tension... embracing a sense of calm that envelops you... (Pause 3s) Your breath is your anchor... steady and sure... guiding you through each moment... (Pause 5s)

You have all the resources you need within you... to remain centred and composed... (Pause 3s)

Picture a tree... standing tall and unwavering... its roots deeply embedded in the earth... (Pause 5s) You are like this tree... grounded and strong... drawing nourishment from the earth... from your inner reservoir of courage... (Pause 3s) Each contraction... each wave... is part of the journey... bringing you closer to the moment you cradle your baby in your arms... (Pause 5s)

You welcome these waves... knowing they are part of the beautiful dance of birth... (Pause 3s)

There is a light within you... a beacon of serenity and assurance... (Pause 5s) As you focus on this light... it grows brighter... illuminating your path... (Pause 3s) You are moving forward... towards a future filled with love and the joy of welcoming new life... (Pause 5s)

Feel the warmth of this light... spreading throughout your body... filling you with peace... (Pause 3s)

In this moment... you are preparing for the gentle arrival of your baby... (Pause 5s) You see yourself in the birthing room... surrounded by support and care... (Pause 3s) The atmosphere is one of calm and tranquillity... each person present is there to honour your journey... (Pause 5s)

You are enveloped in a cocoon of safety... trusting in the process... trusting in yourself... (Pause 3s)

The ocean continues to whisper its secrets... teaching you the art of riding the waves with grace... (Pause 5s) Just as the tide flows in and out... your surges come and go... each one bringing you closer to holding your baby... (Pause 3s) You are a part of this natural cycle... a cycle of creation and life... (Pause 5s)

With each surge... you are opening... welcoming this new chapter with open arms... (Pause 3s)

As you journey further into this experience... you recognise the strength that resides within you... (Pause 5s) A strength that has been with you all along... waiting to be embraced... (Pause 3s) You are capable... you are prepared... and you are ready for this beautiful experience... (Pause 5s)

Feel the reassurance of these truths... settling into your heart... and your mind... (Pause 3s)

Every breath you take is a reminder of the life growing within you... (Pause 5s) The bond between you and your baby is strong... and as you breathe... you are nourishing this connection... (Pause 3s) With each moment... you are moving closer to meeting your little one... the culmination of this incredible journey... (Pause 5s)

You are calm... you are confident... and you are ready... (Pause 3s)

As you continue to drift deeper into this serene state, imagine yourself one week from now, feeling even more connected and in tune with your body... You see yourself moving through each day with a sense of peace and assurance, embracing the journey you're on... (Pause 3s) Each time you hear the sound of the ocean, whether in your mind or in the world around you, it gently reminds you of your inner strength and the natural rhythm of your body...

Now, picture yourself a month from now, preparing for the birth of your baby... As you do, feel the confidence radiating from within, knowing that you are ready... (Pause 5s) Visualise the scene around you  the room, the comforting presence of those you choose to have by your side...

Envision the waves of each surge, rising and falling, guiding your baby gently into the world... (Pause 3s)

See yourself calmly breathing through each wave, each breath bringing you closer to that moment of joy... With every exhalation, you release any tension, trusting completely in the natural process unfolding... (Pause 5s) Your body knows exactly what to do, and you trust it completely...

Whenever you find yourself in need of calm, imagine a wave softly washing over you, bringing with it a profound sense of relaxation and control... (Pause 3s) You can choose a word, perhaps "calm" or "peace", to anchor this feeling whenever you need it... Whisper it silently to yourself and let the wave carry you to a place of serenity... (Pause 5s)

You are strong... You are capable... You are ready... (Pause 3s)

With each breath, you reinforce your inner strength, reminding yourself of your worth and the incredible journey you are on... Each day, you grow more confident in your ability to birth your baby calmly and joyfully...

As you prepare for the months ahead, envision yourself holding your baby for the first time... Feel the warmth, the love, the connection... (Pause 5s) Know that this moment is the culmination of your strength, your trust in yourself, and the nurturing environment you've created...

You are surrounded by love and support, and you draw from this well of positivity whenever you need it... (Pause 3s) Each time you feel the gentle movement of your baby, it becomes a reminder of the incredible bond and journey you are sharing...

In the days leading up to your birth, trust in your ability to handle whatever comes your way... You have the tools, the knowledge, and the strength to manage each wave, each sensation, with grace and calm... (Pause 5s)

Remember, just as the ocean ebbs and flows, so too will your experience... You are part of this natural rhythm, and it carries you forward with ease... (Pause 3s)

And now, as you begin to return to the present moment, bring with you the strength and serenity you've cultivated here... Know that you can access this place of calm whenever you need it... (Pause 5s)

Whenever you feel a surge approaching, take a deep, cleansing breath, and imagine riding the wave with confidence and ease... (Pause 3s) Let each breath be a reminder of your strength and capability...

You are ready for this journey... You are prepared for the wonderful moments ahead... (Pause 5s)

In a moment, I will count up from one to five, and with each number, you will feel yourself becoming more aware of the room around you, bringing with you all the calm and confidence you have cultivated...

One... feeling a gentle awareness returning...

Two... bringing with you the peace and strength you've discovered...

Three... beginning to move your fingers and toes gently...

Four... feeling refreshed and empowered...

Five... eyes open, fully present, ready to embrace your journey with calm and confidence...

## Termination

As you prepare to return to full awareness... you carry with you a deep sense of calm and confidence... (Pause 3s) knowing that your body is perfectly designed for this beautiful journey...

In a moment, I will count from one to five... with each number, you will become more aware... more awake... (Pause 5s) and more energised... feeling the calm assurance flowing through you...

One... feeling the energy returning to your body... gentle waves of awareness...

Two... becoming more present... more awake... your mind and body in perfect harmony... (Pause 3s)

Three... taking a deep breath... feeling refreshed and revitalised... knowing that you are strong, capable, and ready... (Pause 5s)

Four... your eyes beginning to flutter open... carrying with you the serenity and confidence from this experience... (Pause 3s)

And five... fully awake... fully aware... feeling calm, confident, and ready for the beautiful birth experience ahead...

Remember... you have within you the power to embrace each moment with grace... (Pause 5s) Trust in yourself and in the natural process... and know that you are wonderfully prepared...

With each breath, feel the calm and confidence grow... you are ready... and everything will unfold beautifully...

scripts.title: Building Confidence for Children
scripts.introduction: A gentle script tailored for children aged 7-12, designed to boost self-confidence, reduce worry, and foster a sense of inner strength using age-appropriate language and vivid imagination.
scripts.content:
## Induction - Journey to Tranquillity

Allow your eyes to gently close... and take a deep breath in... filling your lungs with calm and peace... (Pause 3s) As you breathe out... imagine releasing any worries or tension... just letting them drift away... like clouds in a gentle breeze... (Pause 5s)

Now, bring your attention down to your toes... feeling a warm, soothing sensation... like soft sunshine... embracing each toe... (Pause 3s) Let this warmth spread slowly... up through your feet... easing away any tightness... (Pause 5s) Feel your feet becoming heavy... and relaxed... resting peacefully in their place...

As this gentle relaxation flows upwards... it moves into your ankles and calves... like a gentle stream of comfort... (Pause 3s) With each breath... the soothing sensation travels higher... spiralling around your legs... releasing any stiffness or tension... (Pause 5s) Your legs feel loose and light... floating comfortably...

Now, feel the relaxation reaching your knees... wrapping them in a blanket of peace... (Pause 3s) Moving up to your thighs... the warmth spreads... melting away any remaining tension... (Pause 5s) Your thighs become soft and relaxed... like resting on a cosy, fluffy cloud... perfectly at ease...

With each breath, the relaxation continues its journey... now reaching your hips and lower back... (Pause 3s) Feel the comforting warmth spreading here... releasing any knots or tightness... letting go of all that is not needed... (Pause 5s) Your body feels supported... and free...

The wave of calmness now travels upwards... into your tummy... where it swirls gently... like a soft, soothing breeze... (Pause 3s) Any butterflies fluttering there... are now calm and still... (Pause 5s) Your tummy feels light... and settled...

The relaxation flows into your chest... spreading warmth and peace... with each gentle breath you take... (Pause 3s) Feel your chest rising and falling... in a smooth, easy rhythm... (Pause 5s) Your heart is calm... your breath is steady...

Now, let the relaxation reach your shoulders... often carrying so much... they deserve to be free... (Pause 3s) Imagine them softening... as if a gentle weight is lifted... (Pause 5s) Your shoulders drop... releasing any tension... feeling loose and light...

The soothing wave moves down your arms... all the way to your fingertips... (Pause 3s) Feel your arms becoming heavy... like theyre resting in warm, soft sand... (Pause 5s) Every finger relaxes... with a gentle, calming sigh...

Now, the relaxation flows up your neck... easing away any tightness... (Pause 3s) Feel your neck becoming supple and free... (Pause 5s) The warmth travels up... gently cradling your head...

Your face relaxes... feel your jaw unclenching... your cheeks softening... (Pause 3s) Your eyes... though closed... feel light and peaceful... (Pause 5s) Your forehead smooths... like a calm, serene lake...

Finally, the relaxation reaches the very top of your head... surrounding you in a cocoon of comfort... (Pause 3s) Your whole body is now deeply relaxed... from the tips of your toes... to the crown of your head... (Pause 5s) Rest here... in this wonderful tranquillity... knowing you are safe... and at peace...

## Deepener - The Enchanted Forest of Confidence

Imagine now... you are walking through a magical forest... where everything sparkles with shimmering light... (Pause 3s)

The leaves on the trees are a brilliant emerald green... and as you walk, they whisper gently... telling stories of bravery and joy. (Pause 5s)

Feel the soft moss under your feet... like a plush, green carpet that hugs your toes... with every step, you feel a little lighter... a little braver. (Pause 3s)

Above you, the sky is a perfect, endless blue... dotted with fluffy, marshmallow clouds... and a golden sun that wraps you in a warm, cosy hug. (Pause 5s)

As you wander deeper into this enchanted forest... you notice a path lined with vibrant flowers... each petal glistens like tiny jewels... inviting you to explore more. (Pause 3s)

You hear the gentle babbling of a stream... its water as clear as crystal... flowing smoothly over sparkling stones... singing a song of courage. (Pause 5s)

You follow the sound... and find a beautiful, shimmering lake... its surface shimmering like diamonds in the sunlight... reflecting your wonderful, confident self. (Pause 3s)

By the lake, you see a majestic tree... its branches reaching high into the sky... wise and strong... just like you can be. (Pause 5s)

Nestled in the roots of this tree... is a special treasure chest... it glows with a soft, golden light... and you feel drawn to it. (Pause 3s)

You gently open the chest... inside, you find a magical cloak... its woven with threads of courage and kindness... and sparkles with a thousand tiny stars. (Pause 5s)

As you wrap this cloak around your shoulders... you feel its warmth... wrapping you in strength and happiness... making you feel like the bravest version of you. (Pause 3s)

The cloak whispers in your ear... reminding you of all the times youve been strong... all the times youve been kind... and how truly special you are. (Pause 5s)

You feel a tingling sensation... from the tips of your fingers to your toes... as your confidence grows... like a bright, glowing light inside you. (Pause 3s)

The trees around you sway gently... cheering you on... their leaves rustling in applause... for the brave adventurer you are. (Pause 5s)

You take a deep breath... the air smells sweet like honey... and as you breathe out... you feel all your worries floating away... like little clouds drifting in the sky. (Pause 3s)

You know that this enchanted forest... and your magical cloak... are always with you... whenever you need a boost of confidence... they are just a thought away. (Pause 5s)

Feel the joy and strength in your heart... as you continue your journey... through this magical world... ready to face any adventure with courage. (Pause 3s)

And as you walk back along the path... you carry the enchantment of this forest... the whispers of the trees... and the magic of your cloak... wherever you go. (Pause 5s)

You are brave... you are strong... and this magical confidence is now part of you... always and forever. (Pause 3s)

## Therapeutic Content

Imagine you are in a beautiful garden... It's your garden, filled with all your favourite things... Bright flowers, soft grass, and the gentle song of birds... (Pause 5s)

This is where you feel happy and calm... You can be yourself here...

Sometimes, you might feel a little shy or unsure... like a small bird learning to fly... (Pause 3s) And that's okay because everyone feels that way sometimes... (Pause 3s) But you are stronger and braver than you know...

Picture a magic cape... It's your special cape of confidence... (Pause 5s) It wraps around you like a warm hug...

It's soft, colourful, and full of sparkles... (Pause 3s) Whenever you wear it, you feel like you can do anything...

You might see a tiny seed in the garden... It's small, but it holds so much potential... Just like you... (Pause 5s)

With a little sunshine and rain, it grows tall and strong... (Pause 3s) You have everything you need inside you to grow, too...

Feel the cape's gentle weight on your shoulders... It whispers to you, "You are brave... You are smart...

You are important..." (Pause 5s) And you can smile knowing it's true...

Think about how you can try new things... like a playful puppy exploring a big, exciting world... (Pause 3s) Each step you take makes you feel more confident... (Pause 5s) Your cape is always with you, helping you along the way...

When you feel unsure, remember the cape... It glows with a light just for you... (Pause 5s) It reminds you of all the times you've done something amazing... (Pause 3s)

And those memories make you shine even brighter...

Imagine your heart like a treasure chest... Filled with special jewels of courage and kindness... (Pause 5s) Each time you believe in yourself, you add another jewel... (Pause 3s)

And your heart becomes even more beautiful...

You might see yourself standing tall like a tree... Your roots are deep and strong... (Pause 5s) The wind may blow, but you stand firm... (Pause 3s)

You are part of this wonderful world...

Feel the warmth of the sun on your face... It's like a gentle pat on the back saying, "Well done"... (Pause 5s) You can do great things, little by little... (Pause 3s)

And each day is a new chance to grow...

Your cape shimmers as you walk through your garden... It's your special place where you can practice being confident... (Pause 5s) Each time you wear it, you remember how wonderful you are... (Pause 3s)

And it helps you feel brave in your everyday adventures...

When you wake up each morning, think of your cape... Imagine putting it on, feeling its soft fabric... (Pause 5s) Know that you are ready for anything the day brings... (Pause 3s)

You have the power to make today amazing...

As you explore your world with curiosity... Each step forward is like adding another piece to a beautiful puzzle... (Pause 5s) And you are the artist creating your special picture... (Pause 3s)

With your cape, you can paint your world with bright, happy colours...

Remember, it's okay to ask for help... Even the strongest superheroes have friends by their side... (Pause 5s) Your family and friends are like a team... (Pause 3s)

Together, you can achieve anything...

Feel the joy of your garden and the strength of your cape... Let them fill you with confidence... (Pause 5s) Knowing you are loved and supported... (Pause 3s)

And that you can face any challenge with a smile...

Every time you believe in yourself, your confidence grows... Like the most beautiful flower in your garden... (Pause 5s) You can do wonderful things, and the world is waiting to see... (Pause 3s)

Wear your cape proudly, and let your light shine...

Imagine yourself tomorrow... waking up in the morning... feeling a little bit different... a little bit braver... (Pause 3s) As you get ready for school, you notice a special feeling in your heart... like a gentle warmth spreading... (Pause 5s) You smile to yourself because you know... today, youre wearing your invisible superhero cape... (Pause 3s)

Its a cape that makes you feel strong and confident... ready to take on any adventure that comes your way... (Pause 5s)

At school, you notice that when its time to answer a question... your hand goes up without a second thought... (Pause 3s) You speak clearly, and your voice is steady... like a calm, flowing river... (Pause 5s) Your friends notice how confident you are... and they smile at you... and you feel so proud... (Pause 3s)

Next week, when you try something new... maybe its a new game or a new lesson... youll feel excitement bubbling inside you... like fizzy lemonade... (Pause 5s) Youll remember that you can do it... youve got the superhero cape on your shoulders, after all... (Pause 3s) You might even surprise yourself with what you can do... and thats a wonderful feeling... (Pause 5s)

As the weeks turn into months... you notice how everyday things become easier... (Pause 3s) Talking to new people feels natural... like saying hello to an old friend... (Pause 5s) And when you face challenges... you remember the magic shield you carry inside... a shield that deflects worry and doubt... (Pause 3s)

Its your special power... to try, learn, and grow... (Pause 5s)

Whenever you start to feel unsure... you can imagine gently touching your superhero cape... (Pause 3s) Feel its soft, comforting fabric... whispering that you are brave and capable... (Pause 5s) Or imagine holding your magic shield... shining brightly... keeping you safe... (Pause 3s)

Every time you touch your cape or shield... you will feel a surge of confidence... like a wave of joy washing over you... (Pause 5s) It reminds you that you are strong... and you can handle anything... because you are amazing just as you are... (Pause 3s)

Remember, you are like a mighty tree... with roots that go deep down into the ground... (Pause 5s) Your roots are made of all your strengths, talents, and the love of those around you... (Pause 3s) You stand tall and proud... swaying gently with the breeze, but never falling... (Pause 5s)

You are capable... you are important... and you are loved... (Pause 3s) Every day, you grow more and more into the incredible person you are meant to be... (Pause 5s) Your courage and kindness are your superpowers... and they make the world a better place... (Pause 3s)

So as you continue on your journey... remember the superhero cape on your shoulders... the magic shield in your heart... (Pause 5s) They are always with you... helping you to shine brightly... (Pause 3s)

Feel the warmth of these truths as you take a deep breath... (Pause 5s) Let it fill you up with light and happiness... (Pause 3s) Knowing that you can face anything with a smile... (Pause 5s)

As you prepare to return to the room... bring back all these magical feelings with you... (Pause 3s) The confidence... the joy... the strength... (Pause 5s) Its all part of you now... (Pause 3s)

Take a moment to stretch your fingers and toes... feeling refreshed and energised... (Pause 5s) When youre ready... open your eyes... bringing with you all the courage and confidence youve discovered... (Pause 3s)

You are ready for anything... because you are uniquely you... and thats your greatest power... (Pause 5s)

## Termination

As you gently return to the present moment... feel the warmth of your breath... flowing smoothly in and out... (Pause 3s)

In a moment, I will count from one to five... with each number, you will become more aware... more awake... (Pause 5s)

One... feeling a gentle wave of energy... beginning to refresh your mind...

Two... becoming more aware of the room around you... the sounds... the sensations... (Pause 5s)

Three... as confidence fills your heart... like a bright, shining light... you feel strong... capable... (Pause 3s)

Four... almost fully awake now... knowing you can approach each day with courage... and belief in yourself... (Pause 5s)

And five... eyes open... fully awake... feeling refreshed and confident... the world is yours to explore...

Remember... you are brave... you are capable... you are wonderfully unique... (Pause 3s)

Each time you feel unsure... simply close your eyes... and remember this calm, confident place inside you... (Pause 5s)

Embrace the adventures that each day brings... with courage and joy... you have everything you need within you...

Keep shining brightly... the world is waiting for your light... (Pause 3s)

scripts.title: Healing from Grief
scripts.introduction: This script supports individuals processing grief and loss. It provides a safe, compassionate space to honour their feelings, begin the healing process, and find a sense of peace while keeping treasured memories alive.
scripts.content:
## Induction - Journey to Serenity

Begin by settling into a comfortable position, allowing your body to sink gently into the surface beneath you... Feel the cushion of support holding you with care. (Pause 3s) Close your eyes softly and take a deep breath in... let it fill your lungs... and release it slowly, allowing any tension to drift away like leaves on a gentle stream. (Pause 5s)

Turn your attention to your toes... Feel them becoming heavy and warm... almost as if they are melting into relaxation... one by one. (Pause 3s) Let this warmth begin to travel upward through your feet, loosening every muscle... every joint... releasing any tension with each breath. (Pause 5s)

Now, bring your focus to your ankles and calves... Imagine a soothing wave of relaxation washing over them... calming and tranquil... as it flows gently upwards. (Pause 3s) Feel your muscles unwinding, releasing, becoming soft and pliable... like a gentle breeze caressing a field of tall grass. (Pause 5s)

Notice your knees now... and allow them to relax completely... as if they are floating in a serene pool of water... buoyant and free of any heaviness. (Pause 3s) Let this sense of calm rise into your thighs... warm and comforting... spreading serenity like sunlight across a quiet meadow. (Pause 5s)

As this wave of relaxation continues, it reaches your hips and pelvis... enveloping them in a cocoon of peace... and tranquility. (Pause 3s) Feel your lower body becoming loose and at ease... as if it's gently swaying in a hammock on a lazy afternoon. (Pause 5s)

Now, let your attention travel upwards to your abdomen... with each breath, feel your stomach softening... releasing any knots or tension that may linger. (Pause 3s) Observe how your breathing becomes more effortless, more natural... like the rhythmic lapping of ocean waves upon the shore. (Pause 5s)

Allow this soothing sensation to spread into your chest... filling your heart space with warmth and light... each heartbeat a gentle reminder of your inner strength and resilience. (Pause 3s) Notice how your shoulders begin to drop... releasing any burdens they may carry... surrendering to this peaceful moment. (Pause 5s)

Feel the relaxation flowing down your arms... to your elbows... and wrists... like a gentle river winding its way to the sea. (Pause 3s) Allow your hands and fingers to relax completely... as if they are dipped in warm, liquid silk... soft and serene. (Pause 5s)

Turn your focus to your neck and throat... and let go of any stiffness... let your neck become supple and free... like a willow bending gracefully in the wind. (Pause 3s) Feel this sense of release continue upwards... to your jaw, cheeks, and eyes... all tension melting away... leaving only calm and comfort. (Pause 5s)

Finally, bring your awareness to the top of your head... imagine a gentle, golden light pouring over you... soothing and healing... filling your entire being with warmth and peace. (Pause 3s) Let this light envelop you completely... as you drift deeper into relaxation... floating in a safe, peaceful space... where healing and tranquillity await. (Pause 5s)

## Deepener - The Garden of Memories

As you settle deeper into relaxation, imagine yourself standing at the entrance of a lush, serene garden... a garden that holds all the memories you cherish. (Pause 3s) The air is gentle and warm, carrying the faint scent of blooming flowers... each one representing a moment, a feeling, a connection with your loved one. (Pause 5s)

As you take a slow, deep breath, you notice the path beneath your feet... soft and welcoming, guiding you through this sacred space. (Pause 3s) The gentle rustling of leaves creates a soothing symphony... the music of nature embracing your heart. (Pause 5s)

Step by step, you wander deeper into this garden... where time seems to slow, and each moment unfurls like a delicate petal. (Pause 3s) You may notice the vibrant colours around you... each hue a reminder of the joy and love you shared. (Pause 5s)

Feel the warmth of the sun as it gently caresses your skin... like the gentle touch of your loved one's hand. (Pause 3s) Let the light wrap around you, comforting and familiar... a reminder that their love continues to shine within you. (Pause 5s)

There is a peaceful river flowing through the garden... its waters clear and reflective, symbolising the flow of life and emotions. (Pause 3s) You watch as it gently meanders, carrying leaves and petals... a natural cycle of release and renewal. (Pause 5s)

You hear the soft whispers of the breeze... each breath of wind carrying words of comfort and understanding. (Pause 3s) Know that it's perfectly okay to feel what you feel... every emotion is a testament to the depth of your love. (Pause 5s)

As you continue to explore, you come across a beautiful oak tree... its branches strong and steadfast, offering shade and solace. (Pause 3s) You rest here for a moment, feeling the strength and support of its presence... just like the enduring bond you share. (Pause 5s)

In this space, allow yourself to connect with the positive memories... the laughter, the warmth, the moments of pure joy. (Pause 3s) Each memory is a flower in this garden... blooming eternally in the soil of your heart. (Pause 5s)

Notice the seasons gently changing around you... spring, summer, autumn, and winter... each one a reminder that life moves in cycles. (Pause 3s) With each change, new growth appears... silently, respectfully, and in its own time. (Pause 5s)

Feel the gentle rhythm of the earth beneath you... the pulse of continuity and life. (Pause 3s) Know that in this garden, you are never alone... your loved one is always with you, in every cherished memory. (Pause 5s)

As you slowly begin to walk back along the path, take a moment to gather some of these flowers... tangible symbols of the love and memories you hold dear. (Pause 3s) Feel their presence within you, always accessible, always treasured. (Pause 5s)

With a heart full of love and a spirit gently soothed, know that you can return to this garden whenever you need... a place of healing, remembrance, and peace... (Pause 5s)

## Therapeutic Content

As you settle into a state of calm and deep relaxation... imagine yourself standing at the edge of a gentle river... the water flows steadily, carrying with it leaves and small twigs from the trees that line its banks... (Pause 3s) You notice how the river accepts all that comes its way... allowing it to flow naturally... without resistance or haste... (Pause 5s)

Grief is like this river... a natural and ongoing process... just as the water flows, so too do your emotions... they come and go, sometimes gently, sometimes with more force... (Pause 3s) And it's okay to feel what you feel... to let the tears flow when they need to... to find comfort in moments of stillness... (Pause 5s)

In the midst of grief, it can be challenging to see beyond the pain... to remember the warmth and love that still exist... (Pause 3s) Yet, just as the seasons change, your experience will transform over time... (Pause 5s) The spring does not rush to bloom after winter... it unfolds in its own time... and so will your heart... (Pause 3s)

You are on a journey... and it's perfectly natural to take one careful, gentle step at a time... (Pause 5s) As you walk this path, you carry with you the essence of your loved one... the memories you shared... like seeds planted in the garden of your heart... (Pause 3s) Each memory a fragrant blossom that brings comfort and connection... (Pause 5s)

Imagine now, this garden of memories... a special place where you can visit anytime you wish... where the sun always shines softly and the air is filled with the scent of blooming flowers... (Pause 3s) Here, you can sit and remember the laughter you shared... the quiet moments of companionship... the love that still surrounds you... (Pause 5s)

In this garden, you can also plant new seeds... seeds of hope and healing... knowing that in time, they will grow and flourish... (Pause 3s) Just as the gardener tends to each plant with care, you too can nurture these seeds within your heart... (Pause 5s) Allowing them to take root and bring new colours and life to your journey... (Pause 3s)

It's important to remember that grief does not have a timetable... it moves at its own pace, like the river and the changing seasons... (Pause 5s) And just as nature finds balance, you too will find moments of peace and solace amidst the waves of emotion... (Pause 3s) Each feeling is valid, each tear a testament to the love you hold... (Pause 5s)

As you continue to relax, picture yourself now walking along a path in this garden of memories... the path is soft beneath your feet and lined with vibrant flowers and lush greenery... (Pause 3s) With each step, you feel more connected to the love and wisdom of your departed loved one... (Pause 5s) You carry their spirit with you, a guiding light on your journey... (Pause 3s)

Know that you have the strength to navigate this river of grief... to honour your emotions and let them flow naturally... (Pause 5s) And as the river flows, it shapes the land around it, creating new paths and landscapes... (Pause 3s) So too will your heart find new ways to grow and heal... (Pause 5s)

In this moment, give yourself permission to feel whatever arises... to accept the ebb and flow of your experience... (Pause 3s) Trust that, like the river, you will find your way... guided by the love and memories that are forever part of you... (Pause 5s)
