Turn your attention to your toes... feel them gently releasing any tightness... imagine a warm, soft wave of relaxation... starting at the tips of your toes, flowing upwards... (Pause 3s) Feel this wave gently caressing the soles of your feet... easing away any pressure or strain... (Pause 5s)

Now, let this wave of calmness travel up to your ankles... swirling around them in gentle circles... loosening any tension, allowing them to become relaxed... (Pause 3s) Feel this soothing sensation wrapping around your calves... like a gentle embrace, easing and calming every muscle... (Pause 5s)

Let this sensation continue its journey... flowing into your knees... releasing any stiffness, any tightness... leaving only serenity behind... (Pause 3s) As it moves up into your thighs... feel the heaviness drift away... replaced by a comforting lightness... (Pause 5s)

Notice how this wave of relaxation gently cradles your hips... and lower back... as it travels upwards... allowing you to sink deeper into a state of calm... (Pause 3s) Feel your abdomen soften... as the gentle wave flows through... washing away any tension... (Pause 5s)

Allow the relaxation to spread across your chest... feel it expanding with each breath... creating a space of tranquillity within... (Pause 3s) Let the soothing wave continue to your shoulders... feel them release their burden... becoming loose and free... (Pause 5s)

Notice the wave drifting down your arms... like a gentle stream... flowing through your elbows, wrists, and into your hands... (Pause 3s) Each finger uncurling, relaxing... as the wave of calmness washes over them... (Pause 5s)

Feel the gentle wave travel back up... caressing your neck... dissolving any tension... as it continues to your jaw... allowing it to soften... (Pause 3s) Imagine the wave cascading over your face... smoothing your forehead, relaxing your eyebrows... (Pause 5s)

Let the wave reach the top of your head... a warm, comforting sensation... as if enveloped in a gentle cocoon of peace... (Pause 3s) Feel this wave of relaxation now enveloping your entire body... from the top of your head to the tips of your toes... (Pause 5s)

With each breath, feel yourself sinking deeper... into a serene state... as the wave continues to flow... carrying away any remnants of stress... (Pause 3s) Allow yourself to be fully present in this moment... embraced by the calm, healing energy surrounding you... (Pause 5s)

Trust in the soothing power of this relaxation... feel it nourishing your skin... promoting calm and healing from within... (Pause 3s) Enjoy this peaceful state... knowing you are supported... and that your body is capable of wonderful healing... (Pause 5s)

## Deepener - Healing Waterfall

Imagine yourself standing at the edge of a tranquil forest... where the gentle whisper of leaves in the breeze softly caresses your senses... (Pause 3s) In front of you, a majestic waterfall cascades down... each droplet shimmering in the sunlight, carrying with it the essence of calm and healing... (Pause 5s)

As you step closer, feel the cool mist embrace your skin... each droplet a tiny messenger of peace, gently soothing and relaxing every part of you... (Pause 3s) The water sparkles with a shimmering light... a light that seems to hold within it a promise of renewal and comfort... (Pause 5s)

Picture this healing waterfall flowing towards you... its waters infused with a calming, nurturing energy... (Pause 3s) See how it touches your skin, washing away any tension or stress that may have burdened you... (Pause 5s) Allow this gentle cascade to envelop you, as it flows over and around, embracing you in its cooling embrace... (Pause 3s)

As the water flows, sense it carrying away any discomfort... the itching, the irritation... each drop a gentle balm, easing away those sensations... (Pause 5s) Feel your skin responding to this healing touch... as if drinking in the refreshment, the relief... (Pause 3s)

Breathe deeply, inhaling the crisp, clean air that dances around the waterfall... (Pause 5s) With each breath, feel a profound sense of calm spreading throughout your body... like ripples on a pond, soothing every cell, every fibre of your being... (Pause 3s)

Visualise this waterfall as a source of endless healing light... a light that radiates through every part of you... (Pause 5s) Let it illuminate your skin, infusing it with a gentle, nurturing energy that supports its natural healing... (Pause 3s) See this light as a protective shield, keeping away any stress that seeks to disturb your peace... (Pause 5s)

Imagine this light soaking into your skin... permeating deep into every layer, encouraging balance and harmony from within... (Pause 3s) Like a soft, silken veil, it wraps around you... calming any inflamed areas, reducing redness, soothing irritation... (Pause 5s)

As the waterfall continues its gentle flow, sense the connection between your mind and your skin... (Pause 3s) Feel how the release of tension in your mind mirrors the calmness in your skin... a serene symphony of peace and healing... (Pause 5s)

Allow yourself to be fully immersed in this experience... knowing that each moment spent here is a gift to your body and your soul... (Pause 3s) The waterfall is always here, within your mind... a sanctuary you can return to whenever you need... (Pause 5s)

In this place, you find a deeper understanding... that your skin is a living, breathing part of you... (Pause 3s) A part that thrives on calm, on care, and on the gentle touch of healing waters... (Pause 5s) Embrace this knowledge as you continue to relax, knowing that you are supporting your body's natural ability to heal and renew... always... (Pause 3s)

## Therapeutic Content

As you settle into this soothing space... feeling the gentle rise and fall of your breath... allow yourself to begin this journey towards calm and healing... (Pause 3s)

Take a moment to acknowledge your experience... the sensations on your skin... the itching or irritation that you may have felt... It's important to recognise and validate these feelings... knowing that they are part of your journey... (Pause 5s)

Now... imagine yourself standing in a serene forest... surrounded by the soft sounds of nature... the gentle rustling of leaves... the distant call of a bird... This is a place where you can let go of stress and tension... a place where healing begins... (Pause 3s)

In the centre of this forest... you see a beautiful waterfall... cascading gently over smooth rocks... The water sparkles in the sunlight... cool and pure... inviting you to come closer... (Pause 3s)

As you approach this healing waterfall... feel the cool mist on your skin... soothing and refreshing... Allow yourself to stand beneath the gentle flow... feeling the cool water wash away any tension or discomfort... (Pause 5s)

With each drop of water that touches your skin... imagine it carrying away any stress or irritation... leaving only calm and comfort behind... This is your time to heal... to allow your skin to renew and rejuvenate... (Pause 3s)

You might begin to notice... a soft, healing light... glowing within you... This light spreads warmth and comfort throughout your body... reaching every part of your skin... (Pause 3s)

Visualise this light gently flowing to those areas that need it most... bringing with it a sense of peace and relief... soothing any itching or irritation... You are supporting your body's natural ability to heal... (Pause 5s)

Feel the connection between your mind and your skin... knowing that as your mind finds peace... your skin follows... (Pause 3s)

Imagine now... the water from the waterfall... cool and invigorating... continues to flow over you... carrying with it a gentle energy... empowering your skin to heal... to restore itself... (Pause 5s)

Notice how this cooling water eases away any discomfort... each drop a promise of calm... each ripple a renewal of balance... (Pause 3s)

As you stand beneath this waterfall... allow yourself to feel the stress of the day simply melting away... knowing that you are safe... supported... and healing... (Pause 3s)

You are beginning to shift... to a new way of being... where your body and mind work in harmony... creating an environment for healing... (Pause 5s)

And as you continue to breathe deeply... imagine your skin becoming more resilient... more comfortable... each breath a step towards wellness and calm... (Pause 3s)

The connection between your emotions and your skin is strong... and as you tend to your thoughts and feelings... your skin responds... becoming a canvas of balance and serenity... (Pause 5s)

With every moment that passes... your skin finds relief... the itching subsides... the irritation fades... replaced by a soothing calm... (Pause 3s)

Now... imagine a gentle breeze... carrying away any remaining discomfort... leaving your skin feeling refreshed and renewed... (Pause 3s)

You are allowing your body to do what it knows best... to heal... to restore... and to thrive... (Pause 5s)

As you continue to stand in this healing space... feeling the cool water flow over you... know that you are embracing a new pattern of wellness... one where your skin is supported and nurtured... (Pause 3s)

Let the imagery of this waterfall stay with you... a reminder of the peace and healing that is always within reach... (Pause 3s)

With each breath... each moment... you are moving closer to a state of ease and comfort... a space where your skin can heal naturally... (Pause 5s)

Feel the soothing, cooling water... the gentle light... working together in harmony... creating a sanctuary of healing within you... (Pause 3s)

Imagine the sensation of calm spreading through your skin... rippling outwards... touching every part of you with peace and comfort... (Pause 5s)

You are embracing this journey... a journey towards healing... towards calm... where your skin can find its natural balance... (Pause 3s)

As you continue to relax... feel the gentle flow of healing light and water... merging together to soothe and support you... (Pause 3s)

You are in a state of healing... where stress has no place... and only calm and comfort remain... (Pause 5s)

As you continue to embrace this state of deep relaxation, imagine yourself stepping forward into tomorrow... into a day where your skin feels calm, at ease... (Pause 3s) Visualise yourself waking up, feeling refreshed, and as you look in the mirror, you notice a gentle glow... a sign of your skin's ongoing healing. Picture yourself gently washing your face with cool, soothing water, each drop carrying away tension and stress... leaving behind only serenity. (Pause 5s)

As the days progress, imagine yourself moving through your daily routine with a newfound confidence... your skin feeling comfortable, free from irritation. (Pause 3s) Picture yourself engaging with others, noticing how they see your radiance and ease, reflecting back the calm you feel inside. Imagine someone complimenting you on how well you look, and you smile, knowing it's not just your skin... but a deeper sense of peace within that they see. (Pause 5s)

Visualise yourself a few weeks from now, perhaps standing in a place you love... maybe a garden, or a park, feeling the gentle breeze on your skin. Notice how your skin responds, supple and relaxed, radiant under the light of the sun. (Pause 3s) Imagine your hands touching your skin, feeling its smoothness, and knowing that each day, with each gentle touch, you are supporting its natural healing... (Pause 5s)

In the months ahead, you see yourself embracing situations that once might have been challenging, now with a calm assurance. (Pause 3s) You are centred, balanced, and your skin reflects this inner harmony... a mirror of your inner strength. (Pause 3s) Notice how your skin continues to heal, responding to your love and care, growing stronger and more resilient. (Pause 5s)

Throughout your days, whenever you wish to reinforce this calm and healing state... you can take a deep breath, and as you exhale, imagine a cooling, soothing light... flowing gently over your skin. (Pause 5s) This light becomes an anchor for you, a reminder that you have within you the power to support your healing... to bring comfort and ease. (Pause 3s)

Whenever you feel the need, you can bring to mind the image of a healing waterfall... its cool, clear waters cascading over your skin, washing away stress and tension... leaving behind only peace and calm. (Pause 5s) This waterfall is always within you, ready to soothe and support you whenever you need it. (Pause 3s)

Remember that each time you drift into relaxation, you are giving your body the gift of healing... allowing your skin to regenerate and renew. (Pause 5s) Your body is wise, capable, and you are deeply worthy of this healing. (Pause 3s) Each day, in every way, you are becoming more comfortable in your skin, more at ease in your life. (Pause 5s)

You are strong, resilient, and capable. (Pause 3s) You have within you the ability to nurture your skin, to support its health and vitality. (Pause 5s) You are worthy of love, care, and healing... and you are embracing this truth more fully each day. (Pause 3s)

As you continue to walk this path of healing, remember that you are not alone... (Pause 3s) the universe supports you in this journey, sending you peace and strength. (Pause 5s) You are a beautiful expression of life, and your skin is a testament to your journey, your growth, and your healing. (Pause 3s)

In a moment, you will return to full awareness, bringing with you this deep sense of peace... this inner glow. (Pause 5s) Know that you can return to this place of calm whenever you choose, simply by taking a deep breath and visualising that soothing light, or that healing waterfall... (Pause 3s) Feel the power of your breath, the strength of your intention, guiding you towards healing and wholeness. (Pause 5s)

As you prepare to come back to the present moment, bring with you all the calm, the healing... the strength you have gathered here. (Pause 3s) Allow each breath to reawaken your senses, filling you with energy and light. (Pause 5s) When you are ready, open your eyes, feeling refreshed, renewed, and ready to embrace your day with confidence and grace... knowing that you are on a path of healing, and you are exactly where you need to be.

## Termination

As you begin to drift back to the surface of awareness, feel the warmth of calm and healing spreading through your skin... (Pause 3s) In a moment, I will count from 1 to 5, and with each number, you will feel more awake, more refreshed...

1... Your mind becomes lighter, and the sense of calmness lingers like a gentle breeze... (Pause 5s)

2... Healing energy flows through every part of you, soothing and nurturing your skin... (Pause 3s) Feel the harmony and balance enveloping you...

3... You are becoming more alert, your senses awakening, yet the serenity remains... (Pause 5s) Visualise your skin glowing with health and vitality...

4... Almost fully awake now, bringing with you the positive suggestions of calm and healing... (Pause 3s) Know that your skin is vibrant and strong...

5... Eyes open, fully present in this moment... (Pause 5s) Carry with you the tranquillity and confidence of your skin's natural resilience...

Remember, each day is a step towards your skin's natural radiance... Trust in the process and embrace each moment with peace and assurance...

scripts.title: Staircase Deepener
scripts.introduction: A classic deepening technique using the imagery of descending a beautiful staircase. Each step takes the individual deeper into a state of profound relaxation and receptivity.
scripts.content:
## Deepener - The Descending Staircase

Imagine yourself standing at the top of a grand staircase... The air around you is serene and inviting, filled with a gentle warmth that wraps around you like a comforting blanket... Each step ahead is a new journey into deeper relaxation, guiding you further into calmness and peace... (Pause 3s)

As you take your first step down, the number ten appears before you... The staircase is crafted from polished mahogany, smooth and cool beneath your feet... Soft, golden light filters in from an unseen source, casting gentle shadows that dance around you...

The air carries a subtle, soothing aroma of lavender, inviting you to relax even more deeply... (Pause 5s)

With each step you take, you feel yourself sinking deeper into comfort... Moving down to the ninth step, you notice the rich texture of the wood... The colour is a deep, inviting brown, with intricate patterns swirling like a gentle tide...

The temperature is perfect, neither too warm nor too cold, just right for you to feel at ease... (Pause 3s)

As you step onto the eighth stair, you are enveloped by a sense of tranquillity... The walls around you are adorned with soft tapestries in shades of blue and green... They sway gently, as if a soft breeze were passing through, whispering secrets of serenity...

The light is mellow, creating a soothing ambience that invites you to let go... (Pause 5s)

Descending further, you reach the seventh step... The air feels even softer here, embracing you with its gentle touch... You notice the subtle scent of jasmine mingling with the lavender, a perfect blend of calm...

The wood beneath your feet is smooth and reassuring, grounding you with every step... (Pause 3s)

On the sixth step, you feel a deeper sense of calm washing over you... The staircase seems to glow with a soft, ethereal light, illuminating your path with gentle radiance... The temperature is perfectly balanced, a comforting warmth that soothes every part of you...

The air is filled with a tranquil silence, broken only by the soft whisper of your breath... (Pause 5s)

Continuing your descent to the fifth step, you are surrounded by a world of peace... The walls are now adorned with gentle hues of lavender and soft pink, colours that invite relaxation and calm... The air is fresh and crisp, carrying with it the faint scent of chamomile, easing any tension you may feel...

Everything is aligned perfectly for your comfort, for your deepest relaxation... (Pause 3s)

As you reach the fourth step, you notice how light and free you feel... The staircase is bathed in a soft, golden glow, like the first light of dawn... The wood beneath your feet is warm and reassuring, guiding you effortlessly...

Each breath you take deepens your sense of calm, carrying you further into tranquillity... (Pause 5s)

Stepping onto the third stair, you are enveloped by a profound stillness... The air is filled with the scent of fresh rain, clean and invigorating... It mingles perfectly with the lavender and jasmine, creating a symphony of relaxation...

The light is gentle, casting soft patterns on the walls, inviting you to relax even further... (Pause 3s)

Approaching the second step, you are surrounded by an ocean of peace... The colours around you have softened to a gentle, soothing grey, like a comforting mist... The wood beneath your feet is polished and smooth, offering a perfect path to relaxation...

You feel a sense of weightlessness, as if you are floating on a cloud of calm... (Pause 5s)

Finally, you arrive at the first step, feeling more relaxed than ever before... The air is perfectly still, filled with the soothing aroma of sandalwood and vanilla... The staircase glows with a soft, inviting light, wrapping you in warmth and serenity...

You are ready to let go completely, embracing the peace and calm that surrounds you... (Pause 3s)

With each breath, you sink deeper into this state of relaxation... The staircase has taken you on a journey inward, to a place where peace is abundant... The textures, the scents, the warmth, have all guided you to this moment...

A moment where you can simply be, in perfect harmony with yourself... (Pause 5s)

As you stand on this final step, take a moment to appreciate the calmness that envelops you... The journey down the staircase has been one of gentle discovery, revealing layers of relaxation... You are in a space of ultimate tranquillity, where time slows down and peace reigns... (Pause 3s)

## Deepener - The Descending Staircase

... As you step onto the seventh stair, your foot meets a surface that feels like the softest moss, cool and inviting beneath your feet. The air around you is infused with the gentle scent of pine and earth, a soothing balm that quiets the mind. (Pause 3s)

The walls here are adorned with delicate ferns, their fronds whispering softly as a gentle breeze passes by, caressing your skin. The light is a muted green, filtering through an unseen canopy above, casting intricate patterns that dance with each step you take. (Pause 5s)

Descending now to the sixth step, you notice the change in texture beneath you... a plush, velvety carpet that cushions each step, absorbing all tension from your body. (Pause 3s) The ambient light shifts to a warm golden hue, reminiscent of a late afternoon sun, wrapping you in its comforting embrace. The temperature is perfectly balanced, warm yet refreshing, like a gentle summer's day. (Pause 5s)

You feel a sense of serenity enveloping you, each breath drawing you deeper into this tranquil space.

On the fifth stair, the surroundings transform once more... beneath your feet, the sensation of soft, cool sand, its grains shifting gently with each step. (Pause 3s) The air carries with it the soothing sound of distant waves, a rhythmic lullaby that eases your entire being. The light here is a soft blue, reminiscent of a clear sky meeting the endless horizon, inviting you to gaze into its vastness. (Pause 5s)

With each breath, you feel the calming influence of this place, as if the very essence of peace is flowing into you.

Continuing to the fourth step, the texture underfoot changes to that of smooth, polished wood, its surface warm and reassuring. (Pause 3s) The scent of cedar fills the air, grounding you, connecting you to the earth's ancient wisdom. A gentle glow emanates from lanterns placed along the walls, their flickering flames casting a dance of shadows that mesmerises and soothes. (Pause 5s)

The temperature is perfectly pleasant, neither too warm nor too cool, just right for this moment of profound relaxation.

Stepping onto the third stair, you encounter the sensation of lush grass beneath your feet, cool and dewy. (Pause 3s) The air is crisp and invigorating, carrying the fresh scent of early morning, when the world is still and full of promise. The light here is a gentle lavender, a soft embrace that calms the mind and soothes the soul. (Pause 5s)

You are aware of a light breeze, carrying with it the whispers of nature, gentle and reassuring, guiding you further into this serene journey.

As you descend to the second stair, the surface beneath you becomes a smooth, cool marble, polished to perfection. (Pause 3s) The air is filled with the delicate fragrance of jasmine, a sweet, calming scent that wraps around you like a gentle hug. The light shifts to a soft silver, like moonlight on a tranquil night, illuminating your path with a soft, ethereal glow. (Pause 5s)

The temperature is perfect, the air brushing against your skin with the softness of a tender embrace, inviting you to sink deeper into relaxation.

Finally, you reach the first stair... the surface beneath you is a gentle cloud, soft and buoyant, supporting you effortlessly. (Pause 3s) The air is filled with the subtle aroma of lavender, a soothing balm that eases any lingering tension. The light is a gentle, embracing white, enveloping you in its purity, calming every part of your being. (Pause 5s)

You feel a profound sense of peace, as if every breath is drawing you into a deeper state of calm.

With each step you have taken, the journey has brought you to this place of profound relaxation... a sanctuary of calm and peace, where the outside world fades away and you are left with the soothing presence of your inner self. (Pause 3s) Here, at the bottom of the staircase, you find a deep, abiding peace, a quietude that fills your mind and body, bringing with it a sense of profound stillness and serenity. (Pause 5s)

Bask in this deep relaxation, allowing it to permeate every cell, every fibre of your being... knowing that you can return to this place of peace and tranquillity whenever you choose... simply by descending these steps once more. (Pause 3s) As you rest here, in this serene space, notice how each breath you take deepens your relaxation, grounding you in the present moment, where all is well. (Pause 5s)

Feel the support of the earth beneath you, the gentle embrace of the air around you, and the soothing light that surrounds you... each element working in harmony to create a cocoon of calm that nurtures and sustains you. (Pause 3s) Here, you are safe, you are whole, and you are deeply, profoundly relaxed. (Pause 5s)

Allow yourself to linger in this place of serenity for as long as you wish, knowing that this staircase is always here for you, a path to deep relaxation and inner peace. (Pause 3s) With each journey down, you find new layers of calm, new depths of tranquillity, and a renewed connection to the peaceful essence within you. (Pause 5s)

When you are ready, you may choose to return to the present moment, bringing with you the profound peace and relaxation you have discovered here... knowing that you can carry this calm with you into your daily life, drawing upon it whenever you need. (Pause 3s) But for now, simply rest in the knowledge that you have found a place of deep peace within, a sanctuary you can return to whenever you choose. (Pause 5s)

And as this journey on the Descending Staircase comes to a gentle close, know that the peace and tranquillity you have found here will remain with you, a serene presence within your heart and mind. (Pause 3s) You have journeyed to a place of profound relaxation, and in doing so, you have touched the essence of your own inner peace. (Pause 5s)

scripts.title: Eye Fixation Induction
scripts.introduction: A traditional eye-fixation induction technique where the individual focuses on a single point until their eyes naturally tire and close, leading them into a comfortable state of hypnotic relaxation.
scripts.content:
## Induction - Eye Fixation

Find a comfortable position, either seated or lying down, where you can rest easily for a while... Allow your body to settle into comfort, feeling the support beneath you... (Pause 3s)

Take a moment to breathe in deeply... and as you exhale, let go of any tension you might be holding onto... (Pause 3s) Feel your body relaxing with each breath you take... (Pause 5s)

Now, gently fix your gaze on a spot slightly above your line of sight... Choose a specific point that feels natural for you... (Pause 3s) This could be a mark on the wall, a corner of a picture frame, or perhaps a point where light and shadow meet... (Pause 5s)

Allow your eyes to focus on this spot, and as you do, notice the way your eyes begin to feel... (Pause 3s) With each passing moment, they may start to feel a little heavier... (Pause 5s) As if the weight of your eyelids is increasing... slowly and gently... (Pause 3s)

The longer you gaze, the more you might notice a sense of warmth spreading through your eyelids... (Pause 5s) A comforting warmth that soothes and eases them... (Pause 3s) Almost as if they are being softly caressed by a gentle breeze... (Pause 5s)

Begin to sense the subtle blinking of your eyelids... (Pause 3s) Each blink becoming slower, more deliberate... (Pause 5s) Allow yourself to be aware of these tiny movements... the gentle fluttering... like the wings of a butterfly... (Pause 3s)

And with every flutter, feel a wave of relaxation washing over you... (Pause 5s) Each blink enhancing the heaviness, inviting your eyes to close... (Pause 3s) Notice how natural it feels to let your eyes close, whenever they are ready... (Pause 5s)

As your eyes remain focused, you may observe a slight blurring or softening of your vision... (Pause 3s) Colours might merge and flow, creating a tapestry of soothing hues... (Pause 5s) Shapes may lose their sharpness, blending into one another... (Pause 3s)

This gentle blurring is a sign of your body and mind easing into relaxation... (Pause 5s) Just like a painting in soft focus, everything becoming more serene... (Pause 3s) Embrace this sensation, allowing it to deepen your comfort... (Pause 5s)

Feel the gentle pull of gravity on your eyelids... (Pause 3s) That natural desire to close them, to rest them... (Pause 5s) Like curtains drawn over a stage, ready to reveal a new scene of tranquillity... (Pause 3s)

As you continue to focus, notice how your breathing becomes slower, more rhythmic... (Pause 5s) Each breath guiding you further into a state of calm... (Pause 3s) With every inhale, a sense of peace fills you... and with each exhale, any remaining tension drifts away... (Pause 5s)

Your eyes may begin to feel as if they are gently sinking... (Pause 3s) Sinking into a warm, soothing pool of relaxation... (Pause 5s) Allow yourself to float on this sensation, carried by the gentle currents of calm... (Pause 3s)

As you gaze, you may find your thoughts becoming quieter... (Pause 5s) Like leaves floating downstream, they drift away, leaving your mind clear and serene... (Pause 3s) This quietness is a gift, a space for you to simply be... (Pause 5s)

Notice now how your eyelids feel even more weighted... (Pause 3s) As if they are draped in a soft, velvety fabric... (Pause 5s) You may feel a growing desire to let them close, to give in to this comforting heaviness... (Pause 3s)

With each moment, the impulse to close your eyes becomes more inviting... (Pause 5s) Like a gentle invitation to step into a realm of peace and rest... (Pause 3s) Trust in this feeling, allowing your eyes to close when they are ready... (Pause 5s)

As your eyelids grow heavier, you might notice a gentle tingling sensation... (Pause 3s) A sign of the deepening relaxation spreading through you... (Pause 5s) This tingling is a whisper of tranquillity, guiding you further into calm... (Pause 3s)

Feel the comfort of allowing your eyes to gently close... (Pause 5s) Notice how this simple act of closing your eyes deepens your relaxation... (Pause 3s) Like stepping into a warm, inviting bath, where every muscle can release and unwind... (Pause 5s)

With your eyes closed, let the darkness behind your eyelids envelop you... (Pause 3s) A comforting darkness, like a soft, protective blanket... (Pause 5s) Allow yourself to sink into this feeling, embracing the peace it brings... (Pause 3s)

Imagine now a gentle wave of relaxation flowing from the top of your head, down through your body... (Pause 5s) Feel it soothing and caressing every part of you, releasing any tension... (Pause 3s) Each wave deeper and more calming than the last... (Pause 5s)

As this wave of relaxation continues, notice the stillness within you... (Pause 3s) A stillness that supports and nurtures, allowing you to simply be in this moment... (Pause 5s) Embrace this stillness, feeling its calming presence... (Pause 3s)

With each breath you take, feel the relaxation deepening... (Pause 5s) Each inhale bringing in calm, each exhale releasing any remaining tension... (Pause 3s) Let this rhythm guide you, soothing your mind and body... (Pause 5s)

Allow your thoughts to drift gently, like clouds across a clear blue sky... (Pause 3s) No need to hold onto them... just let them pass by, leaving you in a state of serene clarity... (Pause 5s) This is your time, your space for rest and rejuvenation... (Pause 3s)

Feel the support beneath you, holding you effortlessly... (Pause 5s) As if you are cradled in a soft, gentle embrace, allowing you to relax even more deeply... (Pause 3s) Trust in this support, letting it guide you into a deeper state of relaxation... (Pause 5s)

Notice now how your body feels... (Pause 3s) Perhaps a sense of lightness or a gentle heaviness, as if you are floating or being softly grounded... (Pause 5s) Whatever sensations arise, welcome them, allowing them to enhance your comfort... (Pause 3s)

In this state of relaxation, your body and mind are free to rest and renew... (Pause 5s) Feel the gentle ebb and flow of your breath, like waves lapping at the shore... (Pause 3s) Each breath carrying you further into a peaceful, restorative space... (Pause 5s)

As you relax deeply, imagine a place that brings you peace and joy... (Pause 3s) A sanctuary where you feel completely at ease, surrounded by beauty and tranquillity... (Pause 5s) Visualise this place in your mind, allowing its presence to comfort you... (Pause 3s)

Feel the atmosphere of this place, its warmth and serenity... (Pause 5s) Let it envelop you, enhancing your sense of peace and calm... (Pause 3s) This is your space, your retreat for relaxation and rejuvenation... (Pause 5s)

## Induction - Eye Fixation

And as you continue to gaze softly at that chosen point... noticing the details in colours, textures, and shapes... perhaps you become aware of how the world around that point begins to blur... just slightly... as your focus remains steady and true... (Pause 3s)

You might find that your eyes feel a gentle pull... as if they are being drawn deeper into the object of your attention... perhaps a sense of lightness... or heaviness... begins to gently weave its way into your eyelids... (Pause 5s)

With each soft breath you take... in and out... in and out... there is a tender relaxation spreading from your eyelashes... down through the muscles around your eyes... a warmth and softness enveloping them... (Pause 3s)

And as you continue to gaze... perhaps you notice your eyes becoming tired... a natural weariness setting in... eyelids beginning to feel pleasantly heavy... as if they are draped in a gentle, comforting weight... (Pause 5s)

With every blink... those eyelids may flutter... just a little... like leaves quivering in a gentle breeze... each flutter bringing a deeper sense of calm and ease... a whisper of relaxation... (Pause 3s)

Your attention remains fixed... yet there is a growing invitation from your eyelids... to close... to surrender to the soothing embrace of rest... allowing your eyes to do what they naturally yearn to do... (Pause 5s)

And as they flutter... softly... like the wings of a butterfly... you may find yourself succumbing to a peaceful rhythm... the irresistible call of relaxation drawing you in... deeper and deeper... (Pause 3s)

Each blink becomes slower... more languid... as if time itself has decided to relax with you... and with each gentle flutter... you feel yourself sinking... into comfort... and tranquillity... (Pause 5s)

The muscles around your eyes... soften... as you allow your gaze to become less focussed... more diffused... the edges of your vision melting into a peaceful blur... (Pause 3s)

Feel the soothing heaviness now... as it spreads from your eyelids... down into your cheeks... your jaw... like a warm, gentle tide... washing over you... inviting you to let go... (Pause 5s)

Your eyelids now... feel like soft clouds... so easy... so natural... to just let them close... when they are ready... when you are ready... knowing that this is your time... your safe space... (Pause 3s)

And as they close... so gently... you feel a wave of relaxation cascading over you... like the softest of blankets enveloping you... bringing with it peace... and serenity... (Pause 5s)

Imagine now... a beautiful landscape... perhaps a serene beach... or a lush green meadow... and with your eyes gently closed... you can be there... in that place of calm and beauty... (Pause 3s)

Feel the warmth of the sun on your face... the gentle whisper of the breeze... the sounds of nature... all around you... inviting you to sink even deeper into this moment... (Pause 5s)

With each breath you take... you draw in tranquillity... and as you exhale... you release any remaining tension... letting it float away... like a feather on the wind... (Pause 3s)

Your body... your mind... each part of you... becoming lighter... as you drift further into this soothing state... where time is suspended... and peace is all that exists... (Pause 5s)

Allow yourself to be cradled by this moment... feeling safe... supported... and profoundly relaxed... knowing that this is a sacred space... created just for you... (Pause 3s)

And as you continue to breathe... slowly... deeply... each breath brings you deeper into this wonderful state of ease and relaxation... where every muscle... every fibre of your being... is at rest... (Pause 5s)

Your mind... quiet and still... like a pond at dawn... reflecting the soft hues of the sky... undisturbed by ripples... just calm... and at peace... (Pause 3s)

Feel how the relaxation extends beyond your eyes now... flowing through your entire body... from the top of your head... down to the tips of your toes... a gentle wave of serenity... (Pause 5s)

With each gentle rise and fall of your chest... you are carried deeper... into a haven of comfort and ease... where nothing can disturb you... where you are free... to simply be... (Pause 3s)

And now... as you rest in this state of profound relaxation... know that you are exactly where you need to be... in this moment... and that you can bring this sense of calm with you... wherever you go... (Pause 5s)

When you are ready... and only when you are ready... you can choose to return to the present moment... bringing with you this deep sense of peace... and ease... that is yours to keep... (Pause 3s)

Knowing that you can return to this state anytime you wish... simply by closing your eyes... and allowing yourself to drift... into the gentle embrace of relaxation... (Pause 5s)

And for now... just rest... in this space... in this peace... as long as you need... letting the calmness soak into every part of you... feeling refreshed... rejuvenated... and completely at ease... (Pause 5s)

scripts.title: The Garden of the Mind
scripts.introduction: A versatile therapeutic metaphor using the imagery of a neglected garden being restored and nurtured. Suitable for themes of personal growth, letting go of the past, and cultivating new possibilities.
scripts.content:
## Metaphor - The Garden of the Mind

Imagine for a moment... that you are standing at the entrance of a secret garden... a place that has been waiting for you... (Pause 3s) The gate is slightly ajar... inviting you in... to explore what lies within... (Pause 5s)

As you step through the gate... you find yourself on a narrow path... lined with wildflowers... their subtle fragrances... mingling with the fresh scent of earth... (Pause 3s) Sunlight filters through the canopy of leaves... dappling the ground with patterns of light and shadow... (Pause 5s)

You hear the gentle rustle of leaves... whispering secrets in the breeze... and the distant song of a bird... a melody as old as time... (Pause 3s) As you walk deeper into the garden... each step feels like a journey into your own mind... (Pause 5s)

Here... you discover a space that has been neglected... a part of the garden overgrown with weeds and tangled vines... (Pause 3s) These weeds represent old patterns... outdated beliefs that no longer serve you... (Pause 5s)

You pause... taking in the sight of this untamed area... yet you feel no discouragement... only a quiet determination... (Pause 3s) For you know that beneath the surface... lies rich, fertile soil... ready to nourish new growth... (Pause 5s)

With a deep breath... you roll up your sleeves... ready to clear away what is no longer needed... (Pause 3s) As you begin to pull the weeds... feel the satisfaction of releasing these old constraints... (Pause 5s)

Each weed uprooted... is a step towards clarity... a symbolic act of letting go... (Pause 3s) You sense the soil loosening... becoming more receptive to new possibilities... (Pause 5s)

The sun warms your back as you work... and you notice how easy it becomes... to separate what you wish to release... from what you wish to cultivate... (Pause 3s) The garden starts to look clearer... more open and inviting... (Pause 5s)

In this space... you can begin to prepare the soil... the foundation for new beliefs and patterns... (Pause 3s) Feel the soil in your hands... rich and ready... a canvas for your intentions... (Pause 5s)

You take a moment to visualise... the seeds you wish to plant... each one a new belief or positive intention... (Pause 3s) Envision these seeds... small yet powerful... waiting to take root and flourish... (Pause 5s)

As you gently place each seed into the earth... imagine the potential each holds... the promise of growth and transformation... (Pause 3s) Cover them with soil... feeling a sense of hope and anticipation... (Pause 5s)

Now... it's time to nurture these seeds... to provide them with the care they need to thrive... (Pause 3s) Visualise yourself watering them... each drop of water a symbol of your commitment and support... (Pause 5s)

The garden responds to your care... the seeds beginning to awaken beneath the soil... (Pause 3s) You feel a connection to the cycle of nature... a sense of harmony and balance... (Pause 5s)

As you nurture this garden... you notice how each small effort contributes to the larger picture... (Pause 3s) The garden of your mind is becoming a sanctuary... a place of serenity and growth... (Pause 5s)

In this space... you are free to cultivate your dreams... to watch them take shape and grow... (Pause 3s) And as you tend to this garden... you find a deep sense of peace... knowing that you are creating a life filled with beauty and purpose... (Pause 5s)

## Metaphor - The Garden of the Mind

As you stand in the midst of this tranquil garden... a sense of anticipation fills the air... the soil has been prepared... rich and fertile... ready to receive the seeds of new beginnings... (Pause 3s)

With gentle hands, you reach into the pouch at your side... feeling the cool, smooth surface of each seed... each one a promise of potential... a new belief waiting to be nurtured... (Pause 5s)

You plant them carefully, tenderly... into the welcoming earth... each seed representing a positive change... a new way of thinking... a fresh perspective... (Pause 3s)

And as you cover them with soil... you feel the warmth of the sun on your back... a nurturing presence... encouraging these new ideas to take root... (Pause 5s)

You find a watering can nearby... its weight a reminder of the responsibility you hold... the power to nourish and encourage growth... (Pause 3s)

As you gently pour water over the freshly planted seeds... you imagine it soaking down into the earth... reaching each tiny seed... providing it with the sustenance it needs... (Pause 5s)

The water glistens in the sunlight... reflecting a spectrum of colours... a promise of the beauty that awaits... (Pause 3s)

You notice the air is filled with a fragrance... that of new beginnings... of fresh soil and the subtle perfume of hope... an aroma that lingers softly around you... (Pause 5s)

Time passes in a gentle rhythm here... as you tend to your garden... removing stray weeds that may attempt to sneak back in... ensuring the soil remains pure and nourishing... (Pause 3s)

You watch as the first tender shoots begin to emerge... small and delicate... yet filled with the promise of strength and resilience... (Pause 5s)

Each day, as you return to this garden... you see the shoots grow taller... their leaves unfurling to embrace the light... reaching ever upwards... (Pause 3s)

The garden begins to transform... a tapestry of colours and textures... each plant unique... yet all part of the harmonious whole... (Pause 5s)

Birds flutter in... their songs a sweet serenade... a celebration of life and growth... adding to the symphony of this thriving space... (Pause 3s)

You feel a deep connection... to this garden... to the life taking shape here... and to the changes within yourself... mirrored in the flourishing plants... (Pause 5s)

The garden becomes a sanctuary... a place of reflection and renewal... where you can return to again and again... to find peace and inspiration... (Pause 3s)

You begin to notice the subtleties... the interplay of shadow and light... the gentle sway of the flowers in the breeze... a dance of harmony and balance... (Pause 5s)

The sun continues to nurture... its warmth a constant companion... guiding the plants towards their full potential... (Pause 3s)

As you look around, you see blossoms beginning to appear... vibrant and alive... each one a testament to the care and attention you have given... (Pause 5s)

Their colours are vivid... reds, yellows, blues... a spectrum of possibility... and with each flower, you feel a sense of accomplishment and joy... (Pause 3s)

This garden... your garden... is a reflection of your inner world... thriving and abundant... filled with new beliefs and positive growth... (Pause 5s)

You understand now... that just as you nurture these plants... you can nurture your own mind... planting seeds of positivity and watching them bloom... (Pause 3s)

You feel a sense of gratitude... for this journey... for the transformation you have witnessed and experienced... (Pause 5s)

And as you stand here... surrounded by beauty and life... you know that this garden will continue to grow... evolve... and inspire... (Pause 3s)

You take a deep breath... inhaling the fragrant air... filled with the scent of flowers and fresh earth... a reminder of the cycles of nature... and your own personal growth... (Pause 5s)

With one last look at the vibrant garden... you feel a sense of completion... a knowing that you have cultivated something truly special here... (Pause 3s)

And as you gently close the gate behind you... you carry this experience within... the lessons of the garden... the power of nurturing and belief... (Pause 5s)

You walk away with a lightness in your step... a new perspective... ready to embrace the changes youve cultivated... and the beauty that lies ahead... (Pause 3s)

For you know that the garden of your mind will continue to flourish... a testament to your ability to transform and grow... (Pause 5s)

And as you move forward... you hold onto the knowledge... that you are the gardener of your own destiny... capable of creating a life filled with abundance and joy... (Pause 3s)

With the garden of your mind thriving... you step into the world anew... ready to embrace all that awaits you... with confidence and grace... (Pause 5s)

The journey has been profound... and you carry its treasures with you... always... a source of strength and inspiration... (Pause 3s)

As you continue on your path... may the garden of your mind remain a place of beauty and growth... a sanctuary of peace and possibility... (Pause 5s)

And so, with a heart full of gratitude... you return to the present moment... knowing that you can return to this garden whenever you choose... (Pause 3s)

For it is always there... within you... a testament to your journey... your growth... and your endless potential... (Pause 5s)

And now... as you open your eyes... bring with you the calm and serenity of your inner garden... ready to bloom in every aspect of your life... (Pause 3s)

scripts.title: Hand Clasp Suggestibility Test
scripts.introduction: A classic suggestibility test using the hand clasp technique. This test helps the therapist gauge the client's responsiveness to suggestion before beginning the main hypnotic work.
scripts.content:
## Suggestibility Test - Hand Clasp

Sit comfortably in your chair... feel the support beneath you as you settle in... let your hands rest gently in your lap for now. (Pause 3s) Take a slow, deep breath in... and let it all the way out. (Pause 3s) Allow yourself this moment to relax... to let go of any tension... to simply be present here and now. (Pause 5s)

When you are ready, bring your hands together in front of you... interlace your fingers tightly... as if your fingers are the strands of a strong rope, woven together. (Pause 3s) Feel the connection between each finger... the way they intertwine, supporting one another... creating a unified whole. (Pause 5s)

Now, as you press your palms together... notice the pressure building... the warmth spreading through your hands. (Pause 3s) Imagine that your hands are merging... becoming one solid, unbreakable structure... fused together with an invisible bond. (Pause 5s)

Focus your mind on your fingers... picture them growing stiff and rigid... as if they are transforming into solid stone... heavy and immovable. (Pause 3s) Your fingers are locking tightly... becoming more secure with each breath you take. (Pause 5s)

With every breath in, feel the sensation of your fingers tightening... becoming more and more fixed in place. (Pause 3s) With every breath out, allow any remaining tension in your body to melt away... leaving only the solid connection of your hands. (Pause 5s)

Imagine now that your fingers are glued together... an adhesive stronger than anything youve ever known... holding them firmly in place. (Pause 3s) Even as you try to separate them, you find they remain steadfast... locked and bound by this powerful grip. (Pause 5s)

Take a moment to test this... to gently attempt to pull your fingers apart... notice how they resist, how they refuse to separate. (Pause 3s) Feel the strength in that bond... the unwavering hold that keeps them together. (Pause 5s)

As you try, notice any sensations... the pressure, the resistance... the way your fingers seem to cling to each other with a will of their own. (Pause 3s) This is a safe space to explore these sensations... to be curious about this experience. (Pause 5s)

Now, take another deep breath in... and as you exhale, allow your hands to release... (Pause 3s) feel your fingers gently unlocking... separating with ease, like the petals of a flower opening to the sun. (Pause 5s)

Let any remaining tension drift away... replaced by a sense of calm and relaxation... knowing that you are in control. (Pause 3s) Notice the freedom in your hands now... the lightness... as they rest once again in your lap. (Pause 5s)

Take a moment to enjoy this sense of release... the comfort of returning to a neutral state... where your hands are free to move as they wish. (Pause 3s) Know that this experience was simply a journey... a way to explore the power of your mind and body. (Pause 5s)

You did wonderfully... and you can carry this calm and awareness with you... as you continue through your day. (Pause 3s) Allow this experience to remind you of the connection between your mind and body... and how you can influence it with your intention. (Pause 5s)

### Notes for the Therapist

Observe the client's reactions during the test... noting any signs of resistance or ease in the clasping and release of their hands. (Pause 3s) A strong response, where the client struggles to separate their hands, may indicate a higher level of suggestibility. (Pause 5s)

Conversely, if the client easily separates their hands, it might suggest a lower level of suggestibility... or simply a different style of responsiveness. (Pause 3s) Remember that suggestibility is not a fixed trait... but a fluid state that can vary with context and practice. (Pause 5s)

Use this test as a tool to better understand your client's responsiveness... and to tailor future sessions to their unique needs and abilities. (Pause 3s) Encourage them to reflect on their experience... and share any thoughts or feelings that arose during the test. (Pause 5s)

Always reassure the client that there is no right or wrong way to respond... and that each person's experience is valid and valuable. (Pause 3s) This understanding can build trust and rapport... strengthening the therapeutic relationship. (Pause 5s)

## Suggestibility Test - Hand Clasp

Feel the warmth and vitality in your hands as they press together... sense the natural energy flowing between your fingers... like two powerful magnets drawn irresistibly together... (Pause 3s)

As you hold them tighter, notice how your fingers begin to meld and merge... as though they are no longer separate... but part of a unified whole... (Pause 5s)

Imagine now... that your fingers are becoming stronger... and stronger... like the roots of an ancient tree... intertwining deeply... securely... (Pause 3s)

And as they continue to tighten... sense a growing stiffness... a solidity in those locked fingers... as if they are becoming one... single, unbreakable piece... (Pause 5s)

Now... in a moment... I will ask you to try to pull your fingers apart... but you will find... they are holding firm... as if sealed by an invisible force... (Pause 3s)

Try now... if you will... to separate them... but notice how they refuse to part... how the bond remains steadfast... the more you try... the more they cling together... (Pause 5s)

Feel the sensation of that grip... unwavering... unyielding... as if they are fused in an embrace... of will and intent... (Pause 3s)

And now... release... allow your fingers to gently part... feeling them soften, loosen... as they return to their natural state... relaxed... at ease... (Pause 5s)

Take a deep breath... and as you exhale... let any tension dissolve... drifting away on the breath... leaving you calm and serene... (Pause 3s)

Notice how your hands feel now... perhaps lighter... more free... as if liberated from a gentle spell... (Pause 5s)

This experience... whether your fingers held fast or parted easily... is perfectly natural... and simply reveals how your mind responds to suggestion today... (Pause 3s)

Each person is unique... and this test simply offers a window into your suggestibility... a glimpse into the workings of your subconscious mind... (Pause 5s)

Know that whatever your response... it is a valid and useful insight... an opportunity to explore... and understand yourself more deeply... (Pause 3s)

Now, bring your attention back to the present moment... feeling refreshed... aware... and ready to continue with clarity and insight... (Pause 5s)

### Notes for the Therapist

Observe the client's response carefully. If the fingers remain tightly clasped, it suggests a higher level of suggestibility and openness to hypnotic states. This can indicate a readiness for deeper therapeutic work, as the client may be more attuned to following suggestions.

If the fingers separate easily, this might suggest a more analytical or sceptical mindset, which is equally valuable. Such clients may benefit from more detailed explanations or logical engagement during sessions to foster trust and acceptance.

Regardless of the outcome, provide reassurance that all responses are valid. This helps to build rapport and trust, creating a supportive environment conducive to therapeutic progress.

Use this test as a foundational tool to tailor your approach, ensuring that your methods align with the client's unique psychological landscape.

scripts.title: Timeline Therapy Technique
scripts.introduction: A time line therapy script that guides the individual to float above their personal timeline, allowing them to release negative emotions attached to past events and set positive expectations for the future.
scripts.content:
## Time Line Technique - Releasing the Past

Begin by settling into a comfortable position... allowing your body to become heavy and relaxed... almost as if you are sinking gently into the surface beneath you... (Pause 3s). Take a deep breath in... and as you exhale, feel a wave of calmness washing over you... (Pause 5s). With each breath, you find yourself becoming more and more relaxed... more and more at ease... (Pause 3s).

Now, in your minds eye... imagine a line stretching out before you... representing the timeline of your life... (Pause 3s). This line extends far into the past... and reaches forward into the future... (Pause 5s). You are here in the present, standing comfortably on this line... feeling safe and supported... (Pause 3s).

Visualise this timeline as a path... perhaps it's a golden thread or a gentle stream... flowing effortlessly through the landscape of your mind... (Pause 5s). Notice the colours and textures... perhaps you see vibrant hues or serene pastels... (Pause 3s). Feel the air around you... its gentle caress on your skin... (Pause 5s).

Now, imagine yourself beginning to float gently upwards... rising above the timeline... as if you are a feather carried on a soft breeze... (Pause 3s). From this elevated perspective, you can see the entirety of your timeline... stretching out below you... (Pause 5s). Feel the lightness and freedom of floating... knowing you are safe and secure... (Pause 3s).

As you hover above your timeline... begin to drift slowly back... moving gently towards the past... (Pause 5s). Watch as the years roll back beneath you... each moment a tiny point of light... (Pause 3s). Your mind knows exactly where to go... guiding you effortlessly to the first event where you felt this emotion... (Pause 5s).

Allow yourself to float back, back, back... to a time before this emotion first arose... to a moment where you were free from it... (Pause 3s). Here, in this safe space... you are free to observe without judgement... (Pause 5s). Notice the sights and sounds around you... perhaps there is a gentle breeze, or the warmth of sunlight... (Pause 3s).

Now, in this place before the emotion... allow yourself to release it... let it drift away like a leaf on the wind... (Pause 5s). Feel the release in your body... the lightness in your chest... (Pause 3s). As the emotion dissipates, notice what remains... the peace, the calm, the clarity... (Pause 5s).

In this space of release, ask yourself... what lesson is here for me to learn? (Pause 3s). Be open to whatever comes to you... a thought, a feeling, an image... (Pause 5s). Trust in your subconscious to reveal the insight you need... (Pause 3s).

As you embrace this learning... feel it integrating into every part of your being... spreading warmth and understanding throughout you... (Pause 5s). Know that this lesson will stay with you... guiding you in the days to come... (Pause 3s).

Now, gently begin to move forward along your timeline once more... bringing with you the positive learnings you have discovered... (Pause 5s). As you drift forward through the years... see each moment lighting up with new clarity and understanding... (Pause 3s).

Notice the vibrant colours of your timeline... enriched by your new insights... (Pause 5s). Feel the ease and grace with which you move... carried gently by the supportive current of your mind... (Pause 3s).

Continue to float forward... gathering positive energy and learnings as you go... (Pause 5s). Each point of light you pass through is enhanced by your new awareness... (Pause 3s). The past is transformed, and with it, your present becomes more radiant... (Pause 5s).

As you approach the present moment on your timeline... feel the culmination of all your insights and learnings... (Pause 3s). Allow them to settle within you... bringing a sense of wholeness and completion... (Pause 5s).

Now, gently begin to lower yourself back down... returning to the present moment... allowing yourself to land softly on the timeline... feeling the ground beneath your feet once more... (Pause 3s). Take a moment to appreciate the journey you have taken... the shifts you have experienced... (Pause 5s).

Know that you are safe and supported... here in the now... infused with the wisdom of your past... (Pause 3s). When youre ready, take a deep breath in... and as you exhale, allow your awareness to expand gently back into the room... (Pause 5s).

You are present... you are whole... and you are ready for the second half of the journey... (Pause 3s).

## Time Line Technique - Releasing the Past

You find yourself floating gently above your timeline... suspended in a space that feels both light and expansive... a space where time itself seems to stretch and bend around you... (Pause 5s)

Below, your timeline stretches out... like a river weaving through the landscape of your life... each moment a ripple on its surface... (Pause 3s)

In this serene space, you gently drift backwards... gliding effortlessly over the years... the past unfurling beneath you like a tapestry... (Pause 5s)

As you travel back, you notice the vibrant colours of your past experiences... each hue representing the emotions you've carried... (Pause 3s)

You travel further still... back to a time before the first event that gave rise to this emotion... to a place where the river is calm and still... (Pause 5s)

Here, you pause... floating with a sense of peace and safety... knowing this is a place where change can happen... (Pause 3s)

In this moment, you allow yourself to release the emotion... like a leaf gently dropped into the river below... watching it drift away... carried by the current... (Pause 5s)

As the emotion dissolves, your heart feels lighter... your mind clearer... as if a gentle breeze has swept away a cloud... (Pause 3s)

Now, as you hover in this tranquil space, you open yourself to learning... to understanding the lessons from this past event... (Pause 5s)

What did this experience teach you? Perhaps a lesson of strength... resilience... or compassion for yourself... (Pause 3s)

You gather these insights... like precious gems... each one shimmering with a wisdom that enriches you... (Pause 5s)

With these lessons embraced, you slowly turn your attention forward... ready to journey back along your timeline... (Pause 3s)

As you move towards the present, you collect more positive learnings... each one a glowing light that illuminates your path... (Pause 5s)

You feel the warmth of these insights... their energy infusing your being with a deep sense of peace and empowerment... (Pause 3s)

You drift over pivotal moments... noticing how they now seem lighter, brighter... softened by the lessons you've gathered... (Pause 5s)

With each passing moment, you feel more connected to your true self... more aligned with your inner wisdom... (Pause 3s)

These learnings are like a gentle wind, propelling you forward with a sense of purpose and clarity... (Pause 5s)

As you approach the present, you notice how this new understanding is woven into the fabric of your timeline... (Pause 3s)

You arrive at the present moment, feeling grounded and whole... a gentle assurance settling within you... (Pause 5s)

In this now... you are free... free from the weight of the past... and open to all the possibilities of the future... (Pause 3s)

Now, let's take a moment to future pace... to envision yourself moving forward with this new-found clarity and lightness... (Pause 5s)

See yourself in future situations... responding with wisdom and calm... the lessons you've learned guiding you effortlessly... (Pause 3s)

Notice how this clarity influences your interactions... your decisions... your path ahead... (Pause 5s)

Feel the strength and serenity within you as you move forward... your timeline glowing with the positive energy you've created... (Pause 3s)

With each step you take, this sense of empowerment grows... as natural and effortless as breathing... (Pause 5s)

You see yourself thriving... living authentically... and embracing every moment with gratitude and grace... (Pause 3s)

As this vision becomes clearer, feel the deep sense of safety and assurance that comes with knowing you have the resources within you... (Pause 5s)

In this future space, you are the architect of your own life... painting your path with the colours of your choosing... (Pause 3s)

Now, gently bring your awareness back to your breath... each inhale a wave of calm... each exhale a release... (Pause 5s)

Feel the surface beneath you... grounding you back to the present, yet carrying with you the lightness of this journey... (Pause 3s)

When you're ready, open your eyes... bringing with you the peace and insight from this experience... (Pause 5s)

Know that you can return to this space of clarity and empowerment whenever you choose... (Pause 3s)

As you continue your day, carry with you the understanding that you are always growing... always learning... and always free... (Pause 5s)

scripts.title: Peaceful Beach Visualisation
scripts.introduction: A richly detailed guided visualisation transporting the individual to a beautiful, peaceful beach. This visualisation promotes deep relaxation and can be used as a standalone relaxation exercise or inserted into longer scripts.
scripts.content:
## Visualisation - The Peaceful Beach

Imagine yourself standing at the edge of a vast, sandy beach... The horizon stretches endlessly before you, where the azure sky meets the shimmering ocean... (Pause 3s) Take a deep breath, and as you inhale, let the fresh, salty sea air fill your lungs, refreshing and invigorating... (Pause 5s)

As you gaze out, the sunlight dances upon the water's surface, creating a dazzling display of sparkles that glisten like a thousand tiny diamonds... (Pause 3s) The waves gently lap against the shore, a rhythmic, soothing sound that calms your mind and soul... (Pause 5s) You hear the distant call of seagulls, their cries echoing softly in the salty breeze... (Pause 3s)

Feel the warm, golden sand beneath your feet... Each step you take is cushioned by its gentle softness, the grains slipping between your toes with a comforting familiarity... (Pause 5s) The sun's warmth envelops you, its rays caressing your skin, creating a tranquil sensation of peace and relaxation... (Pause 3s)

With each step along the shore, notice the subtle changes in the sand's texture... Some areas are smooth, while others are dotted with small shells and pebbles, each one unique in its shape and colour... (Pause 5s) You bend down and pick up a shell, feeling its cool, smooth surface in your hand, marvelling at the intricate patterns etched by the sea... (Pause 3s)

As you continue your walk, the gentle breeze carries the unmistakable scent of the sea... It's a blend of salt and freshness, a scent that speaks of freedom and wide open spaces... (Pause 5s) The air tastes crisp and clean, invigorating your senses with each breath... (Pause 3s)

Pause for a moment to absorb this beautiful scene... Let your eyes take in the expanse of the ocean, its deep blue depths stretching far into the distance... (Pause 5s) Notice how the colour changes as the waves roll in, from deep indigo to a lighter, frothy white as they break upon the shore... (Pause 3s)

You find a comfortable spot to sit down, feeling the sand mould gently to your body as you settle... (Pause 5s) The warmth of the sun is soothing, its light a gentle embrace, casting a golden glow over the entire landscape...
